SA20psk:4: nanu ca yogācārabhūmyādiṣu śāstreṣu dharmalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhāritam eveti punas tannirdhāraṇāya yatnavaiyarthyam
SA20psk:6: udghaṭitajñā hi diṅmātreṇa tatsambhavinoviśeṣān niravaśeṣān avaboddhuṃ samarthā iti saṅkṣepoktimeva bahu manyante na vistaroktim
SA20psk:7: ataś ca saṅkṣiptarucisattvānugrahāyedaṃ prakaraṇam ārabdham iti
SA20psk:9: manasikārābhiyuktānāṃ ca pravrajitānām api vistaragranthābhiyogo vikṣepāyaivety ubhayeṣām api dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyartham iha prakaraṇe dharmalakṣaṇaṃ samāsenoktam iti nāsti tadārambhavaiyarthyam
SA20psk:10: athavā saṅkṣepeṇadharmalakṣaṇavyutpannā ayatnena dharmalakṣaṇavistarapratipattisamarthā bhaviṣyantīty ato yogācārabhūmyādīnāṃ vistaragranthānāṃ praveśabhūtam idam ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kṛtamiti
SA20psk:11: kiṃ punar dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyā vinā na sidhyati yatrācāryo dharmalakṣaṇanirdeśaṃ praty ādriyate
SA20psk:13: tathā hidharmalakṣaṇakṛtaparicayasya sandehābhāvād yatheṣṭam ālambane cittam ekāgrībhavati nānyathā
SA20psk:15: viśāradaś ca sāṅkathyaviniścayeṣu sarvapraśnatadvyākaraṇanirdeśasamartho bhavati nānyathā
SA20psk:18: pañcaiva skandhā na nyūnā adhikā vā
SA20psk:19: ātmātmīyagrāhavastupradarśanārthamprāyeṇa hi bālānāṃvijñāna evātmagrāhaḥ śeṣeṣu rūpādiṣv ātmīyagrāhaḥ
SA20psk:20: tathā hi bāhyādhyātmikasya rūpasya karaṇatvena karmatvena vātmanā sambandha iti rūpaskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
SA20psk:21: śubhāśubhānāṃkarmaṇāṃ vedanā vipākaḥ tāṃ cātmā saṃvedayata iti vedanāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
SA20psk:27: dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣv ātmanaḥ sañjñādvāreṇasaṃvyavahāraḥ pravartata iti sañjñāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
SA20psk:28: kuśalākuśalādiṣu saṃskārair ātmābhimatasya cittasya preraṇātsaṃskāraskandha ātmīyagrāha iti pañcaiva skandhaḥ
SA20psk:34: tathāhy adeśasthām api sañjñādivat pracāraudārikatvād deśaparicchedena tām eva vyapadiśanti na sañjñādīn haste mevedanā śirasi me vedaneti
SA20psk:39: rūpaskandha iti samānādhikaraṇo vā syāt ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣovā
SA20psk:41: yasmāt skandhaśabdo rāśiparyāyavacanaḥ tasmād rāśivatprajñaptisantaḥ skandhā iti
SA20psk:45: sambandhārthā ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī rūpaskandhayor iti rūpād anya eva skandhaḥ prāpnoti
SA20psk:48: abhede 'piṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā tattvānyatvenāvācye ca pratimāyāḥ śarīramrūpasya prāgabhāva iti
SA20psk:53: tathaiva ca skandhārtha iti prajñaptisann ucyate
SA20psk:54: ataś ca tattvānyatvenāvācyatve 'pi svopādānāt ṣaṣṭhī navirudhyate
SA20psk:58: nanu caskandhānāṃ prakṛtatvāt katamad rūpam ity asambaddhaḥpraśnaḥ
SA20psk:59: nāsambaddhaḥ skandhānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāttatsvabhāvavyapadeśena nirdhāraṇam aśakyam kiṃ tarhitadupādānanirdhāraṇenaiveti
SA20psk:60: ato rūpaṃ katamad iti praśnaḥna rūpaskandha iti
SA20psk:61: rūpasya kāryakāraṇabhāvena bhedapradarśanārtham āha catvāri mahābhūtānītyādi
SA20psk:62: tathā hi sarvāṇimahābhūtāni sarvasyopādāyarūpasya kāraṇam sarvaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ sarveṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ kāryam
SA20psk:65: bhūtatvaṃ tu punar eṣāṃ vividhopādāyarūpanirvṛttau tais taiḥ prakārair bhavantīti bhūtāni
SA20psk:66: sarvasattvakarmādhipatyādvānādau saṃsāre na kadācin nābhūvanniti bhūtāni
SA20psk:68: tāni punaś catvāry eva na nyūnādhikāni asāmarthyāpārthakatvaprasaṅgāt
SA20psk:70: tasya caitāvadbhir eva parisamāptatvādanyasya ca karaṇīyasyābhāvāt catvāry eva bhūtāni
SA20psk:71: nanu cadhṛtyādivad avakāśam apy upādāyarūpasya kāryam
SA20psk:75: na hy ākāśaṃ nāma kiñcid asty anyatra sapratigharūpābhāvamātrāt
SA20psk:76: avakāśaṃ ca sapratigham eva vastu svasminn avakāśesapratighasyaiva tasmād apasaraṃ dadāti nākāśam
SA20psk:77: na hitasmāt pradeśād rūpavad ākāśam apasṛtam ititasyāvakāśadānaṃ na yujyate
SA20psk:80: tasmād yatra yasyayasmin saty avakāśābhāvaḥ yasminn asati tasya tatrāvakāśa iti tenaiva tasmāt sthānād apasaratā tasyāvakāśo dattaḥnākāśeneti
SA20psk:82: catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāyeti catvāri ca mahābhūtānirūpaṃ catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpam iti ubhayatrāpicaśabdaḥ sambadhyate
SA20psk:83: pañcaprakāreṇajanananiśrayapratiṣṭhopastambhabṛṃhaṇānāṃ hetubhāvenabhautikaṃbhūtāny upādatta ity upādāyaśabdo hetvarthaḥ tadyathendhanam upādāyāgnir bhavatīti tena nimitteneti gamyate
SA20psk:95: bhūtavat pṛthivīdhātvādayo 'pisvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na vijñāyanta iti punar api praśnaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaityādi
SA20psk:98: khakkhaṭam eva khakkhaṭatvam na hy atra bhāvāntaram asti
SA20psk:105: laghutvaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamānaupādāyarūpasyāpi bhūtatvaṃ prasajyeta
SA20psk:106: īraṇaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamāne karmaivāsya nirdiṣṭaṃ syān na svarūpam ity ato 'sya laghutvād upādāyarūpāt karmaṇaś cavyavacchedārtham evam uktaṃ laghusamudīraṇatvaṃ vāyudhātur iti
SA20psk:108: ete ca pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaupādāyarūpeṇeva parasparato 'py avinirbhāgavartina iti kathaṃvijñāyate
SA20psk:110: ata eva caiṣāṃ dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhanāni kāritram uktam
SA20psk:111: kathaṃ nāmaiṣāṃ svarūpato 'nupalabhyamānānām api upalādiṣu kāryataḥ sattvam anumīyeteti
SA20psk:112: tathā hy upalādiṣu saṅgrahapaktivyūhanebhyo jalānalānilānāṃpṛthivīdhātunā sāhacaryaṃ vijñāyate
SA20psk:119: saṅgrāhyāpekṣayāpāṃsaṅgrahaḥ karma pākāpekṣayā tejasaḥ paktiḥ karmavardhanīyakalalāṅkurāpekṣayā vyūhanaṃ vāyoḥ karma
SA20psk:121: svabhāvas tusarvānyabhāvanirapekṣa ity ayaṃ karmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya caviśeṣaḥ
SA20psk:123: bhūtānantaroddiṣṭam upādāyarūpaṃ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca na vijñāyata ity ataḥ pṛcchati upādāyarūpaṃ kata
SA20psk:131: varṇālocanād varṇanirbhāsāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvād vā varṇo viṣayo 'syeti varṇaviṣayaḥ
SA20psk:132: ayaṃcātra prasādārthaḥ tadyathā prasanna ādarśa udakapātre vābimbaṃ pratītya tatpratibhāsaṃ pratibimbam utpadyate tadvatpañcasu rūpaprasādātmakeṣu cakṣurādiṣu rūpagandhādīn pratītya tatpratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante
SA20psk:133: atra cakṣurādīnāṃparasparato viṣayarūpātmakāt prasādān manastaḥ śraddhātaś ca vyavacchedaḥ kāryaḥ
SA20psk:134: rūpaprasādātmakatvāviśeṣādvarṇaviṣayatvāviśeṣāc ca ubhayam ucyate varṇaviṣayorūpaprasāda iti ca
SA20psk:138: tad dhi saty api varṇaviṣayatve narūpaprasādātmakam
SA20psk:140: śraddhāpi hi prasādātmikā rūpādiviṣayā cetyato rūpagrahaṇam
SA20psk:141: varṇaviṣayaḥ prasādaś cakṣurindriyam ityucyamāne śraddhāyā api prasaṅga ity ato rūpagrahaṇaṃkriyata iti śraddhāyā arūpātmakatvāt
SA20psk:143: īśanta ity arthaḥ ādhipatyam asmin saṅghātekurvantīty arthaḥ
SA20psk:150: tadyathā vijānātītivijñānam iti prāpte lyuḍartham anādṛtya vijñānam uktaṃtadvyatiriktavijñātṛsaṅgrahavyudāsārtham evamihāpīndriyavyatiriktaliṅgakalpanāvyudāsārtham evam uktaṃsyād iti
SA20psk:151: yathaiva hi cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ parasparatoviṣayabhedena bheda uktaḥ cakṣurindriyaṃ katamat
SA20psk:154: śabdaviṣayo rūpaprasāda ity evamādi evaṃ rūpādīnām api viṣayāṇāṃ cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir bhedaucyate
SA20psk:155: cakṣuṣa eva viṣayo rūpam na śrotrādīnāmtadviṣayāṇāṃ śabdāditvena vyavasthānāt
SA20psk:156: atra ca manaso navidhir na pratiṣedho 'prakṛtatvāt
SA20psk:157: evaṃ ca rūpādīnāṃparasparato bheda ukto bhavati cakṣuṣo viṣayo rūpam eva nārūpam iti
SA20psk:158: evam api nīlapītādīnāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāṃcakṣurindriyaviṣayāṇāṃ rūpatvenābheda ukto bhavatīti
SA20psk:159: yadi cakṣurviṣayatvena rūpaṃ viśeṣitam eveti evaṃ sati varṇasaṃsthānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti kimartham
SA20psk:164: abhraṃ dhūmorajo mahikā cchāyātapa āloko 'ndhakāramabhyavakāśaṃnabhaśceti te 'pi kasmād atra noktāḥ
SA20psk:169: navarṇasaṃsthānābhyāṃ pṛthag vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyanta itīhapṛthag noktāḥ
SA20psk:172: saṃsthānaṃdīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalam unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātamiti
SA20psk:179: yasmādekadiṅmukhapravṛtte bhūyasi varṇādisaṅghātedīrghabuddhir bhavati alpīyasi hrasvabuddhiḥ caturdiśaṃsame vṛttabuddhiḥ sarvataḥ same parimaṇḍalabuddhiḥekadiṅmukhe sātabuddhiḥ nānādiṅmukhe visātabuddhir iti
SA20psk:180: kathaṃ punar etad gamyate varṇādisamudāye dīrghabuddhirbhavati na punar arthāntarabhūte saṃsthāna iti
SA20psk:181: sparśanadvāreṇāpi dīrghādibuddhyutpatteḥ nacendriyāntaraviṣaya indriyāntaradvāreṇa buddhir utpadyate naikendriyavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt
SA20psk:182: naiva tad indriyajñānam kiṃ tarhy anumānajñānamgandhāt puṣpavarṇajñānavat
SA20psk:183: yathāgandhaḥ puṣpavarṇaniyataḥ na tv evaṃ sparśaḥ saṃsthāna iti viṣamo 'yam upanyāsaḥ
SA20psk:184: tasmād ubhayendriyadvāreṇa ghaṭādivad dīrghādisaṃsthānapravṛtteḥ na tad varṇādibhyo'rthāntaram iti
SA20psk:185: na ca niravayavatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ dīrghādirūpeṇa parasparato bhedo yuktaḥ
SA20psk:186: tasmān nanīlādiparamāṇuvad dīrghādiparamāṇavaḥ santīty ataś casaṃsthānaparamāṇusamudāyo 'pi dīrghādisaṃsthānam ityayuktam dīrghādisaṃsthānaparamāṇvabhāvāt
SA20psk:189: sambandhibhedāc catasyāvaśyaṃ bhedena bhavitavyam abhede vātatsambandhīnām apy abhinnatvaprasaṅga iti
SA20psk:190: tasmān nāsty evadravyataḥ saṃsthānamkiṃ tarhi varṇādiṣv eva tathā tathāvyavasthiteṣu dīrghādi prajñapyate
SA20psk:191: atha vijñaptir nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
SA20psk:193: atra ca tadālambanād eva yaj jāyate cittāt saṃsthānam tad evavijñaptiḥ na punar anyālambanāt
SA20psk:194: evaṃ ca punarbruvata oṣṭhādisaṃsthānam atadālambanacittajatvān nirākṛtam pūrvapraṇidhānajaṃca
SA20psk:195: tad dhi praṇidhānacittādanyavipākahetucittajam apīti na vijñaptir iṣyate
SA20psk:196: tatra yadi vijñaptyākhyaṃsaṃsthānam ekaṃ kāyākhyasamudāyavyāpi tad ekatvād vyāpitvāc ca pratyavayavaṃ gṛhyatesarvasmiṃstadbhāvāt
SA20psk:197: na vā tad ekam bhāgato vyavasthānāt
SA20psk:201: yadi kāyād arthāntaram na saṃsthānam kā tarhi sā
SA20psk:204: sāca kāyasya deśāntarotpattiḥ svanimittaṃ cetanāṃ vijñāpayatīti vijñaptiḥ
SA20psk:207: atra tu rūpavyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥsanniveśataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataś ca
SA20psk:211: dravyasadviṣayatvāc cakṣurādīnām saṃsthānasya vijñapteś caprajñaptisattvāt na cakṣuṣo viṣayatvam asti
SA20psk:213: atra hi lokānuvṛttyā varṇaḥsaṃsthānaviśeṣaṇaś cakṣurviṣayatvena vivakṣitaḥ
SA20psk:214: tathā hisaṃsthānaviśiṣṭaś cakṣuṣā varṇo gṛhyate na kevalaṃsaṃsthānaṃ varṇo vādīrghādisaṃsthānaviśiṣṭavarṇanirbhāsacakṣurvijñānotpatteḥ
SA20psk:215: ato varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ cacakṣuṣo viṣaya iti loke prasiddhiḥ
SA20psk:216: tathā deśāntarotpattiviśiṣṭakāyasantatigrahaṇād vijñaptir api cakṣuṣo viṣaya iti prasiddhiḥ
SA20psk:217: paramārthatas tu saṃsthānavanna varṇo 'pi cakṣuṣo viṣayaḥ saṃsthānavat paramāṇoraniṣpannatvād vijñānasya bāhyārthāviṣayatvāt
SA20psk:219: rūpānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tannirdeśānantaram eva śabdasyanirdeśo nyāyya iti praśnaḥ śabdaḥ katamaḥ
SA20psk:221: evaṃ hy upādāyarūpatvāviśeṣe 'pianyendriyaviṣayebhyo rūpādibhyo 'sya viśeṣa ukto bhavati
SA20psk:222: śrotraviṣayaś ca śabda eveti parasparabhinnānāṃśabdabhedānāṃ śabdāyatanatvenābheda ukto bhavati
SA20psk:237: jihvāyā eva viṣayaḥjihvāviṣayaś ca rasa eveti pūrvad vistareṇa vaktavyam
SA20psk:239: anyas tu bhedastatsaṃyogabhedāt anantaś ca bhavati
SA20psk:240: atra hy upādāyarūpanirdeśaḥ prastutaḥ rasānantaraṃtuspraṣṭavyaikadeśa upādāyarūpatvenoddiṣṭa ity atorasanirdeśānantaraṃ spraṣṭavyaikadeśanirdidikṣayā praśnaḥ spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katamaiti
SA20psk:246: kāyasya viṣaya iti kāyasyaiva viṣayo na cakṣurādīnām itirūpaśabdādibhyo 'sya bheda ukto bhavati
SA20psk:247: kāyasya ca viṣayaḥsparśa eveti bhūtabhautikayoḥ parasparavilakṣaṇatve 'pi sparśatvenābheda ukto bhavati
SA20psk:248: kāyasya viṣaya iti bhūtānām api kāyaviṣayatvād upādāyarūpaprasaṅga ity ata āha mahābhūtāni sthāpayitveti
SA20psk:250: nanu ca kāyendriyeṇa spṛśyata iti ślakṣṇatvādi spraṣṭavyam ucyate
SA20psk:251: yac ca yena spṛśyate niyogāttad api tat spṛśatīti kāyendriye 'pi sparśatvaprasaṅgaḥ
SA20psk:255: tasmādviṣayendriyayor nirantarotpattau yadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayamupalabhate tena sa viṣayaḥ spṛṣṭa ity upacaryate na tuviṣayeṇa vijñānāśrayaḥ
SA20psk:256: ata eva kāyendriyeṇa bhūtāny evaspṛśyanta ity upacaryate na tadāśritā rūpādayaḥkāyavijñānenāgrahaṇāt
SA20psk:257: puṣpādiṣu ca varṇādyupaghātastadāśrayopaghātāt na kāyasaṃsparśād iti
SA20psk:274: nanu ca grīṣme śaradi ca saty api śītauṣṇābhilāṣo na bhavati
SA20psk:276: evaṃ ca tatkāryam apitajjātīyatvāl lakṣyate lākṣaṇikaiḥ
SA20psk:280: ataḥ kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃkṛtveha nirdeśo jighatsā pipāseti
SA20psk:281: vāyudhātubhūyiṣṭho hi kaścit spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo jighatsāhetuḥ koṣṭha utpadyate
SA20psk:298: evamanyasminn apy upādāyarūpe yathāsambhavam āśrayaviśeṣātparasparaviśeṣo 'vagantavya iti
SA20psk:300: rūpaskandhād upādāyarūpād vāvijñaptir evāvaśiṣyata itipraśnaḥ avijñaptiḥ katameti
SA20psk:313: asaṃvaraḥsarv ākār apar opag hāta prav ṛtti ḥ
SA20psk:317: e ftatra caturṣu dhyāneṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare ca sāsravasamādhijo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ
SA20psk:319: tasyāstūpādāyarūpatvaṃ bhūtāny āśritya pravṛtter anuvṛtteś ca
SA20psk:326: anidarśanaṃ sapratigham cakṣurādayaḥ pañca śabdagandharasasparśāś catvāraḥanidarśanam apratighaṃ ca dharmāyatanikaṃ rūpam
SA20psk:328: iha tvekādaśadravya eva rūpaskandho vivakṣita iti sāmādānikam evarūpam anidarśanam apratigham ity uktaṃ nānyat
SA20psk:331: na ca varṇanibhā anyā nīlādikād varṇāt
SA20psk:333: te ca varṇātmakatvādihopāttā eveti punar na nirdiṣṭāḥ
SA20psk:335: vaibhūtvikaṃvimokṣadhyāyigocaraṃ yad rūpamtad vikalpātmakatvād iha nopāttam
SA20psk:337: pratibimbaṃ ca viṣayapratyavabhāso vijñānasyaivetina vijñānāt pratibimbaṃ pratibimbād vā vijñānaṃ pṛthag asti
SA20psk:339: ko vāprabhāvamahatām asmadvidho buddhivispanditāny avagāhituṃ samarthaḥ
SA20psk:341: etad uktaṃ bhavati vijñaptisamādhisambhūtaṃkuśalākuśalam upādāyarūpam vikṣiptāvikṣiptacittasyācittasyaca yad anubadhnātitat parityāgakāraṇābhāve uktaṃ bhavati avijñaptir iti
SA20psk:342: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satīsvasamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃvijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñapayatītyavijñaptiḥ
SA20psk:343: atra ca vaibhāṣikaparikalpitavijñaptivad avijñaptirapi naivāsti pramāṇāviṣayatvāt
SA20psk:345: tathā hiyayā cetanayākṛtābhyupagama upasampadādividhānapūrvakaṃ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇotitayā cetanayālayavijñāne'nāgatatajjātīyacetanotpattaye bījam āhitam yata uttarakālamahaṃ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativirata iti samādānasmṛtirutpadyate
SA20psk:346: rtasyāṃ samutpannāyāṃ yo lajjī na sa śikṣāṃbhinatti
SA20psk:347: evaṃ ca sānubandhā samādānacetanā saṃvara ityuktam bhavati
SA20psk:348: tathā dhyānaṃ mārgaṃ vā samāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpaṃ mārgam āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasyapratilambhād vyutthito 'pi na punar mithyāvāgādiṣu pravartatesaṃyagvāgādiṣv eva pravartate
SA20psk:349: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃkṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni dhyānasaṃvaraś ca vyavasthāpyate
SA20psk:352: evaṃ cakriyācetanābhyupagamacetanā ca sattveṣudrohāśayānugatāsaṃvara ity uktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:353: atra cavijñaptisamādhijatvaṃ subodham eveti na punar ihaprapañcitam
SA20psk:354: kuśalākuśalatvaṃ tu saṃvarāsaṃvaracetanānāṃsvata eva tadanubandhasya kuśalākuśalacetanākṣiptatvāt kuśalākuśalacetanāphalatvāc ca
SA20psk:358: kasmāt punar ayam avijñaptiparyanto rūpaskandho rūpam ityucyate
SA20psk:359: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā t urūpyate rūpyata iti bhikṣavastasmād rūpopādānaskandhaity ucyate
SA20psk:362: sūtre hi vpāṇyādisaṃsparśena rūpaṇād rūpamity uktam
SA20psk:365: iyaṃ ca santānam adhikṛtyocyate nakṣaṇamkṣaṇasyotpādavināśakālayor adhikṛtatvāt
SA20psk:366: rūpaskandhānantaraṃ vedanāskandhanirdeśāvasarastadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād iti praśnaḥ vedanā katameti
SA20psk:370: sa ca svabhāvabhedāt trividhaḥsukho duḥkho 'duḥkhāsukhaś ca
SA20psk:375: punaścoktam sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇādaduḥkhāsukhasya ceti
SA20psk:379: tathā coktam sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃpratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanetivistaraḥ
SA20psk:381: yadi ca viṣayānubhavo vedanā syātekālambanebhyo'sya ko viśeṣaḥsyāt
SA20psk:383: evaṃ tarhisañjñādhimokṣasmṛtiprajñādīnām ālambanadvārako vedanāvatsvabhāvo na vaktavyaḥ
SA20psk:384: athaikālambanebhyonimittodgrahaṇādibhiḥ sañjñādīnāṃ viśeṣa ucyate vedanāyā viṣayānubhavena kiṃ neṣyate
SA20psk:385: sparśānubhavaś catatsamprayogaḥ kāraṇabhāvo vā parikalpyeta tadālambanatvāsambhavāt
SA20psk:388: na ca loke śāstre vānubhavaśabdaḥ kārye kāraṇe vā prasiddhaḥ
SA20psk:390: evaṃtu manyante śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃphalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ
SA20psk:398: yat tarhy uktaṃ pratītyasamutpāde yasyāmutpannāyām aviyogecchā jāyatesā sukhā vedaneti tat katham
SA20psk:400: yasyām utpannāyāmaviyogecchā jāyata ity arthata uktaṃ bhavati tasyāṃniruddhāyāṃ punaḥ saṃyogecchāpi bhavatīti
SA20psk:402: yat tarhyanicchopagatarāgaparyavasthānānāṃ yatīnāṃ rāgaje sukha utpanne viyogecchā jāyate nirodhe cāsaṃyogacchandaḥ tatkatham
SA20psk:404: śīlasamādhiparipanthitvaṃ tasya sukhasya paśyatāṃ tadubhayaṃbhavatīti nāsti virodhaḥ
SA20psk:411: tatra kāyacittopacayapravṛttatvān manojñasvabhāvatvāc ca sukho 'nubhava iti nirodhe punas tatsaṃyogābhilāṣaḥ pravartate
SA20psk:412: kāyacittāpacayapravṛttatvāsvabhāvataś ca pratikūlo duḥkho'nubhava iti tasyotpādetadviyogacchando bhavati
SA20psk:413: yas tu nobhayapravṛtto 'sti ca so'nubhavo 'duḥkhāsukhaḥ akṛṣṇāśuklakarmavat
SA20psk:415: eṣa tu trividho 'nubhavaḥ pratyekam āśrayabhedāt punaḥṣaḍvidho bhavaticakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanakāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajatvāt
SA20psk:419: punaḥ vipakṣapratipakṣabhedena pratyekam anubhavasyadvidhā vyavasthānam sāmiṣo nirāmiṣa iti gredhāśritonaiṣkramyāśritaśceti
SA20psk:422: tasmiṃs tṛṣṇāpriyaikaputropagūḍhanyāyenāviyogam ivecchantī yā pravartatesā āmiṣam
SA20psk:426: apekṣābhiṣvaṅgaprārthanālakṣaṇena kāmenaguṇyante punaḥ punar abhyasyanta iti kāmaguṇāḥ
SA20psk:433: kimarthaṃ punar atrasvarūpata eva bheda ukto nāśrayādibhedena yathānyatra
SA20psk:434: iha saṅkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt sarvabhedānāṃ ca svarūpād apṛthaktvād āśrayādibhedena nokta iti
SA20psk:435: vedanāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ sañjñāskandhanirdeśāvasaraity ataḥ praśnaḥ sañjñā katameti
SA20psk:440: evaṃ tarhicakṣurādivijñānasamprayuktā sañjñāviṣayanimittodgrahaṇātmikā na syāt viśeṣāsaṃlakṣaṇāt
SA20psk:442: anyathāpūrvam agṛhīte viśeṣe paścād api nirūpaṇaṃ na syāt nīlametat pītam etad iti
SA20psk:443: svarūpābhede 'pi bhedaḥ sañjñāyā āśrayataālambanataś ca veditavyaḥ
SA20psk:445: ālambanaṃ punaḥsanimittam animittam parīttammahadgatam apramāṇam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃca
SA20psk:446: tatraśabdadvāreṇa yad artharūpam adhyāropitam tena nimittenavastusvarūpaṃ sanimittam
SA20psk:447: tasmin vastuny adhyāropitaṃrūpam etac chabdo 'sāv iti yā sañjñā sā sanimittālambanā
SA20psk:448: animittaṃ punar anadhyāropitākāraṃ vastusvarūpam nirvāṇam bhavāgraṃ ca
SA20psk:450: avyutpannaśabdārthasambandhasya hi rūpasvarūpa eva sañjñā bhavati na tu rūpam iti
SA20psk:452: nirvāṇadhātur apisarvasaṃskṛtanimittapratyastamitasvarūpa iti tadālambanenāpisamādhinā samprayuktā sañjñā animittālambanā
SA20psk:455: bhavāgrasyātrāsphuṭanimittatvāt tadālambanam animittamucyate 'nudarākanyānyāyena na punas tatra nimittaṃnaivāstīty animittam
SA20psk:462: sañjñāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ saṃskāraskandhanirdeśonyāyyas tadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād ity ataḥ praśnaḥ saṃskārāḥ katame iti
SA20psk:466: sametya sambhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtatvāt sarva evarūpādiskandhasaṅgṛhītā dharmāḥ saṃskārā ity ucyante
SA20psk:469: ata evavedanāsañjñayoḥ sparśamanaskārādibhiś caitasikatvāviśeṣe 'pyāha vedanāsañjñābhyām anye caitasikā iti
SA20psk:470: vedanāsañjñayoścaitasikatve saty api vedanāsañjñāskandhasaṅgṛhītatvān nasaṃskāraskandhe 'sti saṅgraha iti pradarśanārtham
SA20psk:472: tathā hi vedanayā śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃphalavipākam anubhavati
SA20psk:474: sañjñayāhidṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣu nimittam udgṛhya dṛṣṭādiṣudṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātā iti lokaḥ saṃvyavahāre pravartata ity atovedanāsañjñe pṛthakskandhīkṛte nānye caitasikā iti
SA20psk:475: yadivedanāsañjñābhyām anye sparśādayo vicārāntāś caitasikādharmāś cittaviprayuktāś ca prāptyādayaḥsaṃskāraskandhasaṅgṛhītāḥ evaṃ sati sūtravirodhaḥ
SA20psk:479: cetanā hicittābhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānaṃanuvartante manaskārādaya iticetanaiva saṃskāraskandhatvenoktā
SA20psk:480: tathā hi kuśale cittaṃprerayaty akuśale 'py avyākṛte 'pi sukhaduḥkhādyavasthāsv api cittaṃ prerayatīti
SA20psk:481: saṃskāravac caitasikā api dharmā navijñāyanta iti praśnaḥ
SA20psk:484: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ataḥpṛcchati
SA20psk:487: 'pi sparśādayo vicārāntāḥ pañcabhir āśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatāprakāraiś cittānuvartanātsamam prayuktā iti samprayuktāḥ
SA20psk:488: cittena samprayuktā ity aviśeṣābhidhānāt sarveṣāṃ sarvacittasamprayogaḥ prasakta ititannirdhāraṇārtham āha eṣāṃpañca sarvatragāḥ
SA20psk:496: ete hipañcadharmāḥ sarvaṃ cittam anugacchantīti sarvatragaḥ
SA20psk:499: avaśyaṃ hi sarvacittapravṛttiṣutrikasannipātena bhavitavyam trikasannipātaś casparśāvyabhicārīty ataḥ sparśasya sarvatragatvam
SA20psk:501: niranubhavasya nimittodgrahaṇanirapekṣasya cacittasyābhāvād vedanāsañjñayor api sarvatragatvam
SA20psk:502: cetanā tumanaskarmaiveti tayāpy avaśyaṃ sarvatra cetasi bhavitavyamity ata ete pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragāḥ
SA20psk:503: pañca pratiniyataviṣayā iti pratiniyato viṣaya eṣāṃ na sarva itipratiniyataviṣayāḥ
SA20psk:508: etair eva ca samprayuktaṃ cittaṃ kuśalam
SA20psk:509: ṣaṭ kleśāḥ rāgaḥ pratighomāno 'vidyā dṛṣṭir vicikitsā ca
SA20psk:513: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāro 'nyatheti vacanād upakleśā avaśiṣṭā ityaviśeṣābhidhāne 'py asamprajanyāvasānāḥ eveti gamyate
SA20psk:514: kleśāṅgikatvāc cittakleśakaratvāc ca kleśasamīpe vartanta ityupakleśāḥ
SA20psk:515: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāra iti kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ vitarko vicāraś ca
SA20psk:516: anyathāpīti na kevalam ete upakleśā evakiṃ tarhi kuśalā apy avyākṛtā apīti
SA20psk:517: sa eṣa caitasikānāṃ piṇḍaḥsamāsata ekapañcāśad bhavati
SA20psk:518: eṣāṃ tu pratyekaṃ svarūpaṃ na prajñāyata iti praśnaḥ sparśaḥ katamaḥ
SA20psk:521: caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇata eva nirdeśo na karmato yathānyatrasaṅkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt
SA20psk:527: tasmin satitatkālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikāraḥtena sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sasparśaḥ
SA20psk:528: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇasukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraindriyavikāraḥ
SA20psk:531: evaṃ hy uktaṃsūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhāvedaneti
SA20psk:538: etac ca karma cittasantaterālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktam na tuyaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ
SA20psk:539: yad apy atra nidarśanam ucyate samādhilābhī manaskāralābhīty ucyataiti tatraviśiṣṭamanaskāralābhād eva manaskāralābhīty ucyate
SA20psk:540: anyathā hi sarvasattvā eva manaskāralābhinaḥ syuḥ sarveṣāṃpraticittakṣaṇaṃ manaskārabhāvāt
SA20psk:545: atha vā guṇata ity upakariṣu doṣata ity apakāriṣu anubhayata iti madhyastheṣu
SA20psk:547: yasyāṃsatyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspando bhavatiayaskāntavaśād ayaspraspandavat
SA20psk:548: āha ca kṣaṇāntarānavasthānaṃ nirvyāpāraṃ yayā manaḥ
SA20psk:552: tebhyovyavacchedārthaṃ manaskarmety āha vijñānasya parispandaiva yo dharmaḥ sa eva cetanā nānya iti jñāpanārtham
SA20psk:570: yuktitaāptopadeśād vā yad vastu niḥsandigdhaṃ tan niścitam
SA20psk:571: yenaivākāreṇa tan niścitam anityaduḥkhādyākāreṇa tenaivākāreṇa tadvastunaś cetasi niveśanamevam evaitannānyathety avadhāraṇam adhimokṣaḥ
SA20psk:573: adhimuktipradhāno hi svasiddhāntātparapravādibhir apahartuṃ na śakyate
SA20psk:580: tat pūrvagṛhītasyavastunaḥ punaḥ punar ālambanākārasmaraṇam abhilapanatā
SA20psk:582: sāpunarālambanābhilapane sati na cittasyālambanāntareākārāntare vā vikṣepo bhavatīty ato'vikṣepakarmikā
SA20psk:604: evaṃ ca samādhivat prajñāpi pratiniyataviṣayetyuktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:606: saṃyag mithyā vāsaṅkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ
SA20psk:607: yuktir yogaḥ āptopadeśaḥ anumānam pratyakṣaṃ ca
SA20psk:608: tena triprakāreṇa yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ
SA20psk:623: iti karma trividham puṇyam apuṇyam āniñjyaṃ ca
SA20psk:630: astikuśalam akuśalaṃ ca karma tac ca yathākramamiṣṭāniṣṭaphalam tad api kuśalākuśalakarmahetukamneśvarādinirmitam iti ya evaṃ karmaphalasvarūpe 'viparīte cakarmaphalavipākayor hetuphalasambandhe 'bhisampratyayaḥiyaṃ karmaphalayor astitvasampratyayākārā śraddhā
SA20psk:633: duḥkhahetutvātpratyayādyākāraiś cāviparītatvād dhetubhūtās ta eva pañcopādānaskandhāḥ samudayasatyam
SA20psk:636: tatra duḥkhasamudayasatyayor asti duḥkham asti samudaya ity abhisampratyayākāraiva śraddhā
SA20psk:637: nirodhamārgasatyayor abhilāṣākārā śraddhāśakyo mayāprāptuṃ nirodho mārgaś cotpādayitumiti
SA20psk:639: durlabhatvānmahārghatvāt prītikaratvād upakārakaratvād amānuṣādyupaghātapratipakṣatvāc ca ratnānīva ratnāni
SA20psk:640: tatradurlabhatvaṃ bhavabhogeṣv asaktaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣairbodhisattvair nairantaryeṇa bodhisambhāreṣu pravartamānaistribhiḥ kalpāsaṅkhyeyair buddhatvaṃ prāpyata iti durlabham
SA20psk:646: puṇy ajñā nasa mbhā rāṅg abhā vaga manā dvīryapāramitobhayasambhāraḥ
SA20psk:653: amānuṣādyupaghātapraśamanaṃ punar yathoktaṃ sūtre saced bho bhikṣavo 'raṇyagatānāṃ veti vistareṇa yāvad yat tadbhaviṣyati bhayaṃ vā chambhitatvaṃ vā romaharṣo vā tatpratigamiṣyatīti
SA20psk:664: aṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ saṅghaḥ catvāraḥ pratipannāś catvāraśca phalasthāḥ
SA20psk:667: sarvasahetukaduḥkhopaśamātmakatvāt prāpakatvāttaddyotakatvāc ca dharme prasādalakṣanaiva śraddhā
SA20psk:670: sati vastuni guṇavaty aguṇavativā sampratyayākārā sati guṇavati ca prasādākārā satiguṇavati ca prāptum utpādayituṃ śakye 'bhilāṣākārā
SA20psk:673: kuśalaviṣayatvān na tṛṣṇā śraddhāpūrvakatvācchandasya na cchandaḥ
SA20psk:674: cetasaḥ prasāda iti śraddhā hicittakāluṣyavairodhikīty atas tatsamprayogekleśopakleśamalakāluṣyavigamāc cittaṃ śraddhām āgamyaprasīdatīti cetasaḥ prasāda ucyate
SA20psk:675: udakaprasādakamaṇisthānīyaṃ dharmāntaraṃ caitasikaṃśraddhā na rūpaprasādātmiketi pradarśanārtham āha cetasaḥprasāda iti
SA20psk:682: yasya kriyāsu pravṛttir nivṛttir vā sa tasyādhipatiḥ svāmītyarthaḥ
SA20psk:683: ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ vādhipatiṃ svāminaṃ kṛtvāsadbhir vigarhitatvād aniṣṭavipākatvāc ca pāpam evāvadyam tenāvadyena kṛtenākṛtena vā cittasyāvalīnatā
SA20psk:684: kulajñānādibhir guṇaiḥ pāpakriyāyām ātmānam ayogyaṃ matvā kathaṃ hi sā mama yaivaṃvidhenaivaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃkriyate kariṣyate vā dharme 'py etad aniṣṭavipākatvātparopaghātapravṛttatvāc ca garhitam ity evaṃ yātmānaṃ dharmaṃ cāvekṣamāṇasyāvadyena lajjāsā hrīḥ
SA20psk:690: caivaṅkarmāṇaṃ viditvā vigarhiṣyantīty aślokādibhayād avadyena lajjate
SA20psk:694: alobhaity ayam akāras triṣv artheṣu vartate
SA20psk:697: atra pratipakṣa eva vartate nānyasminnābhāva iti pradarśanārtham āha lobhapratipakṣa iti
SA20psk:700: lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu caāsaktiḥ prārthanā ca
SA20psk:704: athavānāgrahaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ nirvidgrahaṇaṃ bhavebhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyākāro yo 'nāgraho 'yam alobhaiti
SA20psk:708: dveṣo hi sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghātaḥ
SA20psk:711: maitrātmako dveṣasya yaḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'dveṣaḥ nānya iti
SA20psk:716: sarva eva hi kuśalā dharmāḥkliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāravirodhāt pratipakṣa ity ata āha bhūtasampratipattir iti
SA20psk:722: tatra dvayoḥ prajñādravyayoḥ samavadhānāsambhavād vīryeṇa samādhinā vā samprayuktā prajñā pratisaṅkhyety ucyateyadbalenānuddhṛtānupahatakleśabījo 'pi kleśānām avakāśan nadadati
SA20psk:734: tatpratipakṣaś ca vīryam ityataḥ kausīdyavad ubhayaprasaṅge vyavacchedārtham āha kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāho vīryamna tu kliṣṭa iti
SA20psk:736: nanu ca kliṣṭaṃ svabhyastatvātsvarasenaiva pravartatekiṃ tatrotsāhena
SA20psk:739: tat punar yatsamprayogātsannāhe prayoge vāalīnatve vāvyāvṛttau vāsantuṣṭau vākuśaleṣu dharmeṣu cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ tad vīryam
SA20psk:749: tatra kāyakarmaṇyatākāyasya svakāryeṣu laghusamutthānatā yato bhavati
SA20psk:750: cittakarmaṇyatā samyaṅmanasikāraprayuktasya hlādalāghavanimittaṃ yac caitasikaṃ dharmāntaram
SA20psk:751: tadyogāccittam asaktam ālambane pravartata ity atas taccittakarmaṇyatety ucyate
SA20psk:752: kāyasya punaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣa evaprītyāhṛtaḥ kāyaprasrabdhir veditavyā
SA20psk:754: atra caitasikādhikārād acaitasiky api kāyaprasrabdhiḥprasrabdhisambodhyaṅgatvenoktākāyakarmaṇyatā vācittakarmaṇyatām āvāhayatīty ato'caitasiky api kāyakarmaṇyatātroktā
SA20psk:761: kleśebhyaś cittaṃ na rakṣati kuśalaṃ ca hāpayati
SA20psk:762: apramādenapunaḥ kleśān prajahātipratipakṣāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayatītyato 'pramādaḥ pramādapratipakṣa uktaḥ
SA20psk:763: alobho yāvad vīryamity alobhādveṣāmohāḥ saha vīryeṇa gṛhyante
SA20psk:764: yān alobhādīnvīryaparyantān niśrityāgamya prāpyākuśalān dharmānprajahātīty anena sarve alobhādayo 'pramāda ity uktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:765: akuśalā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāś ca viṣayā veditavyāḥ
SA20psk:771: yasmād vīryasahītān alobhādīn niśrityākuśalān dharmān prajahāti tatpratipakṣāṃśca dharmān bhāvayati tasmāt savīryeṣv alobhādiṣv apramādaḥprajñapyata ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā sakāraṇā cāpramādasyaprajñaptir uktā
SA20psk:784: nirvāsiteṣu kliṣṭeṣu dharmeṣv iti yayety upekṣaivasambadhyate
SA20psk:787: upekṣā hi saṅkliṣṭavihāravairodhikītyavaśyaṃ tayā rāgādipravṛttivibandhevartitavyam ity atas tayānirvāsiteṣv ity uktam
SA20psk:799: iyaṃ cāpramādavat prajñaptita eva na dravyasatīadveṣāṃśaeva prajñapanāt
SA20psk:809: upādīyate 'nayā tṛṣṇayā tribhavotpattiḥ paunarbhavikaṃ vākarmeti tṛṣṇāyāupādānākhyā
SA20psk:812: yathā hi tailādikaḥ sneho vastrādikam āśrayam anupraviśya vyāpnoti mahatāpi cayatnena svāśrayād durvivecyaḥ evaṃ rāgo 'pi svālambanamanupraviśyaiva vyāpnoti mahatāpi ca prayāsena tasmādālambanāt durvivecya iti sneha ucyate
SA20psk:814: athavā spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo 'pi sneha itivyavacchedārtham āha adhyavasānam iti

SA20psk:819: sattveṣu rūkṣacittatā yenāviṣṭaḥ sattvānāṃ vadhabandhādikamanarthaṃ cintayati

SA20psk:832: tathā hy ātmātmīyabhāvaṃ skandheṣv adhyāropyāyam ahamidaṃ mamety ātmānaṃ tena tena viśeṣeṇonnamayati anyebhyo 'dhikaṃ manyate
SA20psk:834: agauravaṃguruṣu guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu stabdhatā kāyavācor apasṛtatā
SA20psk:836: sapunaś cittonnatisvabhāvābhede 'pi cittonnatinimittabhedāt saptadhā bhidyatemāno 'timānaity evamādi
SA20psk:838: kulavijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥsadṛśena vākulādibhis tair eva sadṛśo 'smīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ
SA20psk:845: śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyānkulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatiḥayaṃ
SA20psk:853: ata etad eva dvayamupādānam ity ucyate
SA20psk:859: tatpratipakṣabhūtaṃ yad dhyānasamāpattyādikaṃ tanmanuṣyadharmebhya uttariviśeṣa ucyate
SA20psk:860: tasminviśeṣādhigama'prāptesatiprāpto mayā uttariviśeṣādhigama itiyā cittasyonnatiḥ so 'bhimānaḥ
SA20psk:864: yuktaṃ tāvat samena samaḥ samānād vā viśiṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭād vā viśiṣṭa ity unnatisthānatvān mānaḥātmānaṃ tu nyūnaṃ paśyataḥ kim unnatisthānaṃ yatas tasyamāna ucyate
SA20psk:866: apica santikecid ye prakṛṣṭe ca sattvarāśau hīnam apy ātmānaṃ bahu manyante
SA20psk:875: aguṇavata ityanena hidānaśīlādyabhāve guṇavattvam abhyupagataṃ bhavatīty atonirvastukatvān mithyāmāna ucyate
SA20psk:883: karmaṇy ajñānaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve yad ajñānamapratipattir anavabodhaḥ iyaṃ sahajā avidyā
SA20psk:884: puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve vicikitsato vāpavadato vā nāstipuṇyam apuṇyam āniñjyaṃ cetipaśubandhāgnipraveśādinivartane puṇye'puṇyasañjñināmpaśubandhāgnipraveśādike vāpuṇye puṇyasañjñināṃ yāvicikitsāmithyādṛṣṭisamprayuktā avidyā sā parikalpitā
SA20psk:886: prajñā nitīrikātmikā dṛṣṭir ucyata ity atolaukikīsaṃyagdṛṣṭyādiprasaṅge dṛṣṭir iti satkāyadṛṣṭyādikāḥpañca dṛṣṭaya ihābhipretā iti pradarśann āha pañca
SA20psk:888: tāsāṃkliṣṭatvāviśeṣe 'py ālambanākārabhedādbhedapradarśanārthaṃ punar apy āha satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭir iti vistaraḥ
SA20psk:893: ātmā hi nityaś caikaś cātmavādibhir abhyupagamyate
SA20psk:895: pañcopādānaskandhānityādi ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmānam ātmīyaṃveti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti ta imān eva pañcopādānaskandhāniti sūtra uktam
SA20psk:896: te hi svarūpataḥ kāryato vā ātmānaṃ prajñapayeyuḥ
SA20psk:898: te ca cittacaitasikaprabhede 'vidvāṃsaḥsakalaṃ cittacaitasikakalāpam eva caitanyam ity āhuḥ
SA20psk:900: na ca buddhivṛttito 'nyac caitanyaṃ svasthacittenaśakyate vaktuṃ pratipattum vā
SA20psk:902: ekeṣāṃca nirgranthānāṃ jñānasvarūpa ātmeti teṣām ātmātmīyagrāho'nantaroktaeva draṣṭavyaḥ
SA20psk:904: yaḥ paśyati yāvan manyate tathā yo vedayateānāti smarati cetayate vijānāti ca sa ātmeti
SA20psk:910: yatra tarhicakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati naivadurmanāiti tatra katham
SA20psk:911: tatrāpi yatrātmaprajñaptiḥ samūhesantāne vā sa eva cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvety ucyate
SA20psk:912: rūpanirbhāsataiva hi rūpadarśanam yasmāt tadbhāvābhāverūpasya darśanādarśane vyavasthāpyete
SA20psk:914: yatra tūktaṃ vedayata iti vedanā evaṃ yāvad vijānātīti vijñānam
SA20psk:917: atha vā viṣayanirbhāsatām upādāya kartṛvyapadeśaḥ yathoktaṃ prāk
SA20psk:918: na cātmalābhavyatiriktākriyā vidyate kṣaṇikatvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ kriyākāle'navasthānāt
SA20psk:920: ātmalābhānantaraṃ cabhāvānāṃ nirhetukatvād yadi vināśo na syāt paścād api nasyāt vinaṣṭur vināśasya ca paścād ātmātiśayābhāvāt
SA20psk:921: sahetukavināśaparikalpe ca vinaṣṭaiva tadvyatirikto vāvināśahetuḥ parikalpyeta
SA20psk:922: pūrvasmin pakṣaātmalābhānantaraṃbhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ naiva vāsti vināśa iti prasajyate
SA20psk:923: yo 'nyanirapekṣaḥ pūrvaṃ yasya na kāraṇam sa paścād api tasyanaiva kāraṇam ātmātiśayābhāvāt
SA20psk:924: itarasminn api pakṣe vināśānāṃ kāraṇaniyamo na syāt
SA20psk:926: naitad evam kāryāṇāṃ hiparasparato bhinnasvarūpatvāt tatkāraṇānām api śaktibhedātniyamo na virudhyate
SA20psk:928: tasmāt sarvaṃ vāvināśakāraṇaṃ sarvavināśasya naiva vā vināśakāraṇam astītipratipattavyam
SA20psk:929: vināśaś ca yadi vināśakāraṇāt pūrvam apy astievaṃ sati vināśakāraṇavaiyarthyaṃ prasajyeta
SA20psk:930: bhāvānāṃ cavināśe saty utpattir iti vinaṣṭānām apy utpattiprasaṅgaḥ
SA20psk:931: athavināśakāraṇebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ na vidyate evaṃ sati bhāvavadabhāvasyāpiprāgabhāvaḥ prajyate
SA20psk:932: yasya ca prāgabhāvaḥtasyacāvaśyaṃ bhāvatvāt pradhvaṃsābhāvenāpi bhavitavyam
SA20psk:933: evaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣāt sarvaṃ bhāvātmakamabhāvātmakam vā prasajyeta
SA20psk:934: yadi ca pradhvaṃsābhāvasyāpipradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ evaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvānām anavasthānāttatkāraṇānām api neṣyateevaṃ satibhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvasyāpi naiveṣṭavyā dvayor apyātmātiśayatvābhāvāt
SA20psk:936: yady ananyā ātmaivātmanaḥ kartā karma ceti nayujyate
SA20psk:937: yadi ca labdhātmakaḥ kriyāṃ karoti nāsautasyātmabhūtā
SA20psk:938: yo hi yena vināpi bhavati na sa tasyātmabhūtoyujyate
SA20psk:940: kriyārahitāc cakriyādhyāsito 'nya eveti kathaṃ kartuḥ karmaṇo vātmabhūtākriyā
SA20psk:942: athālabdhātmakaḥ evam api tasya kartṛtvaṃ kriyāyāś catadātmabhūtatvaṃ na yujyate dvayor apy asattvāt
SA20psk:943: kiṃcaikasya kriyārahitatvāt dvitīyasya kriyādhyāsitatvātkartṛtvābhāvaḥ kartur abhāvāc ca kriyāyā apy abhāva itievaṃ ca svarasavināśāt kṣaṇikatvam evābhyupagataṃ bhavati
SA20psk:947: na ca niḥkriyaṃ karma kartā vāyujyata ity avaśyaṃ tatrānyayā kriyayā bhavitavyam
SA20psk:950: evaṃ tarhi dravyam eva kriyāntararahitaṃ janyatvena kiṃ neṣyate
SA20psk:952: yadi ca kriyā kārakair janyate nadravyam
SA20psk:953: evaṃ prākpradhvaṃsābhāvau kriyāyā eva na dravyasyetisarvadravyāṇi nityāni naiva vā santīty abhyupeyam
SA20psk:954: yadi cakārakebhyo 'nyā kriyā kriyārahitaṃ casādhanam evaṃkriyāṇām anavasthānaṃ sādhanābhāvo vā
SA20psk:957: yadi ca gantur anyāgatiḥ taṇḍulebhyo 'nyā paciḥ evaṃ sati gantur nadeśāntaraprāptiḥ taṇḍulānām vāpacanaṃpūrvāvasthāto'vikṛtatvāt
SA20psk:958: atha kriyaiva svāśrayasya vikārahetur itipūrvāvasthāto vikṛtatvam apratiṣiddham
SA20psk:963: tasmādātmalābhānantaravināśeṣu nirīheṣv antarvyāpārapuruṣarahiteṣupañcasūpādānaskandheṣv eva sadbhāvamātreṇaprāgabhūtānām anyeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ hetubhāvenavyavasthiteṣu nityakartṛbhoktṛgrāhapūrvako 'yamātmātmīyagrāhaḥ nātmany ātmīye ceti
SA20psk:967: na hy amūḍhasyānātmany ātmeti jñānaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:969: tatra svasantatipatitān ātmatvena samanupaśyati parasantatipatitāanupāttāṃś cātmīyatvena

SA20psk:990: draṣṭur ātmabhāvasaṃśabditāḥ yān āśritya dṛṣṭayaḥpravartantete tadāśrayāagrataḥ śreṣṭhatoviśiṣṭataḥ paramataity ete 'grādayaḥ śabdās tulyārthā
SA20psk:992: ayaṃāsad dṛṣṭ yabhi nive śasa nniśrayadān akar maka ḥ

SA20psk:996: yān āśritya skandhāñchīlaṃ vrataṃ vā pravartate te śīlavratāśrayāḥ skandhāḥ

SA20psk:1011: dvidhā matir vimatiḥ syān na syād iti

SA20psk:1016: tās tu pūrvā api santīty ata āha paścimā iti

SA20psk:1026: krodho hy apakāravastuny evavartamāna eva pravartate nānyatreti

SA20psk:1030: vartamānam apakāram adhikṛtya yaś cetasa āghātaḥsattvāsattvaviṣayodaṇḍādānādisanniśrayadānakarmakaśca sakrodha iti prajñapyate

SA20psk:1035: ayaṃ ca krodhavatpradveṣāvasthāviśeṣe prajñapyata iti prajñaptisan veditavyaḥ

SA20psk:1064: kāyavākkuhanopāttāḥ śayyāsanādaya upajīvyante na cavyāyāmalabdhā iti mithyājīva ucyate
SA20psk:1069: tat punar anyenānyat pratisarati kṣipatyaparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate

SA20psk:1074: idaṃ calābhasatkārādhyavasito yābhyāṃrāgamohābhyāṃsvadoṣapracchādanārthaṃ paramohanāya pravartate tayor eva sahitayos tat prajñapyate
SA20psk:1076: saṃyagavavāde yolābho yoniśo manaskāraḥ tasyāntarāyaṃ karotīti
SA20psk:1082: yena harṣaviśeṣeṇa cittamasvatantrīkṛtaṃ tena tad ātmatantrīkaraṇāt paryāttaṃ bhavatītyata uktam cetasaḥ paryādānam iti
SA20psk:1089: etāś canirghṛṇatādayaḥ svayaṃ vadhādiṃ kurvataḥ kārayataḥ paraiśca kriyamāṇān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vānumodataś ca yathākramaṃboddhavyāḥ uttarottaravyākhyānato
SA20psk:1090: eṣa tu saṅkṣepaḥ pratighāṃśikāsattveṣu cittarūkṣatā sattvaviheṭhanakarmikāvihiṃsety ucyate
SA20psk:1092: sa yadyogād evam ucyatehrīvipakṣabhūtaṃ tad āhrīkyam
SA20psk:1099: etac ca dvayam apisarv akle śopa kleś asāh āyya karm akaṃ
SA20psk:1100: rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvasatkāyaprasavahetuṣurāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsambhavaṃ prajñapyate na svatantre sta iti
SA20psk:1104: stimitabhāvaḥ staimityam yadyogāc cittaṃjaḍībhāvāt stimitam iva bhavati nālambanaṃ pratipattum utsahate
SA20psk:1135: prāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃsamādhyālambanād bahir visāryate teṣuyathāsambhavam upakleśātmako vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate
SA20psk:1145: abhipretam anabhipretaṃkuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ kāle'kāle yuktam ayuktaṃ cakṛtvākṛtvā vā mohāṃśikaś cetaso vipratisāraḥ kaukṛtyam
SA20psk:1148: anabhipretaṃ punaḥ parair balād avaṣṭabhyayat kāryate kleśābhibhavād vāyat karoti
SA20psk:1151: taccāpi trividham kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ ca
SA20psk:1157: kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthāvāvṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā sā yato bhavati tan middhaṃ
SA20psk:1158: anyato'py asvatantrā vṛttiś cetaso bhavatīty ata āha cetaso'bhisaṅkṣepa iti
SA20psk:1159: anyato'py abhisaṅkṣepaś cetasa ityasvatantravṛttiś cetasa ity āha
SA20psk:1171: tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadāciccittacetanayor vitarkaprajñaptiḥ kadācit prajñācetasoḥ yathākramam abhyūhānabhyūhāvasthāyoḥ
SA20psk:1172: athavācetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaprajñaptiḥ tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt
SA20psk:1185: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā idānīṃ vaktavyā ity ata āha cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥkatama iti
SA20psk:1187: tattvānyatvataś ca na prajñapyante teviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā iti prakaraṇāt sambadhyate

SA20psk:1190: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣānavagamād viśeṣabubhutsayā praśnaḥ te punaḥ katama iti
SA20psk:1197: pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogo javo'nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṅkhyā sāmagrī cety evamādayaḥ
SA20psk:1198: idānīṃ sāmagryādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ svarūpanirdhāraṇārthaṃpraśnaḥ prāptiḥ katamety evamādiḥ
SA20psk:1201: prāptānāṃdvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu prāptiḥ samanvāgamaḥ samanugamaḥsamanvāgama iti kṛtvā
SA20psk:1202: evaṃ caprāptiśabdaḥ pratilambhesamanvāgame ca vartataiti jñāpitaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1204: bījaṃ vaśitā sammukhībhāvaś ceti tridhābhidyate yathāyogam iti
SA20psk:1205: tatrāyaṃ yogaḥ prathamātkṣaṇād ārabhya prāptir yāvad vaśitāvasthaṃ bījam ucyata itipratilambhasamanvāgamau bījākhyau bhavataḥ vaśitāsammukhībhāvaś ca samanvāgama eva
SA20psk:1207: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtair dharmair āhito vijñāne'nāgatatajjātīyadharmahetuḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣo bījam
SA20psk:1208: bīje hilabdhe tadāyattatvād asammukhībhūtamapi yasya tad bījaṃ tatprāptam ucyate
SA20psk:1211: asañjñā vā samāpattir asañjñisamāpattir asañjñānām vāsamāpattirity asañjñisamāpattiḥ
SA20psk:1214: tatra yaḥ śubhakṛtsnebhyo vītarāgaḥ satṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgaḥ
SA20psk:1222: tathā hisañjñām eva vidūṣayan niravaśeṣacittacaittanirodhaṃ prāpnoti
SA20psk:1226: sarvāsv acittikāsv avasthāsv abhāvāt sacittikāsvapy avasthāsu ye na sarvadā bhavanti te'sthāvarāḥ
SA20psk:1227: sthāvaramālayavijñānaṃ sasamprayogam sarvadā bhāvāt kliṣṭaṃ camanaḥ anāsravamārgasatyasamāpattyavasthāṃnirodhasamāpattyavasthāṃ tām aśaikṣāvasthāṃ ca hitvānyāsusarvāsv avasthāsu bhāvād ity asthāvarāṇām iti viśeṣaṇam
SA20psk:1230: evaṃ cāśrayāvasthāviśeṣeasañjñisamāpattiḥ prajñapyata ity uktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1231: samāpatticittenānantaraṃ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayo yaḥ sa samāpatticittena kṛta ity ucyate
SA20psk:1235: bhavāgrād anuccalito 'py astyākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgaḥpṛthagjana ity ata āha bhavāgrāduccalitasyeti
SA20psk:1236: bhavāgrād uccalita ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥ pratipannakaś ca bhavāgrād uccalitaākiñcanyāyatanād avītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥpratipannakaś cety ata āha ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyeti
SA20psk:1238: ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyabhavāgrād uccalitasyety ubhayābhidhānenaāryasyaiveyamanāgāmino 'rhato vā samāpattiḥ na pṛthagjanasyeti jñāpitaṃbhavati
SA20psk:1239: na hi pṛthagjano bhavāgrād uccalatibhavāgrapratipakṣasya mārgasyābhāvāt
SA20psk:1243: asañjñāsamāpattim iva niḥsaraṇasañjñāpūrvakeṇamanasikāreṇa samāpadyante kiṃ tarhi vihārasañjñāpūrvakeṇa
SA20psk:1244: nirodhasamāpattir bhavāgrakī na cāryāṇāṃ bhaveniḥsaraṇasañjñā pravartate
SA20psk:1246: vihāra iti sañjñā vihārasañjñā viharaty anena iti vā vihāraḥ
SA20psk:1248: nirvāṇasadṛśenasamāpattiviśeṣeṇa vihariṣyāma ity anayā sañjñayā saṃskṛtomanasikāro vihārasañjñāpūrvako manasikāra ucyate
SA20psk:1250: sthāvarāṇāmitiṣaṇṇāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ caturṇām ekasyakāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu yathākramaṃ nirodhaṃsamāpadyamānānām
SA20psk:1252: sthāvarā iti vipākavijñānasaṅgṛhītā api santīty ata āha ekatīyānām iti
SA20psk:1253: kliṣṭasya ca manasaḥ sarvasmin sāsrave cāresthānaśīlatvātsthāvaratvam anyatranirodhasamāpattyaśaikṣāvasthayoḥ
SA20psk:1255: samāpattivijñānakṛto vipākavijñāne pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manaso bījopaghātaḥ
SA20psk:1256: nirudhyate 'nena pravṛttivijñānaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca manaḥ kālāntaram apravṛttita itinirodha ucyate
SA20psk:1260: deve ṣūpa pann asyā sthā varāṇāṃcittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo nirodhaḥ
SA20psk:1261: ubṛhatphalā nāma devāś caturthe dhyāne tṛtīyaṃ sthānāntaraṃ
SA20psk:1264: tatra hyupapannasyāsthāvarāś cittacaittāḥsvāśrayesvajātīyacittacaittabījopaghāte vartamānāḥ kṣāmakṣāmatarāutpadyante yāvad ante 'tikṣāmatāṃ gatāś cittāntaraṃsambandhuṃ na śaknuvanti svāśrayasyopahatabījatvāt
SA20psk:1273: samāno bhāga iti sabhāgaḥ sadṛśa ity arthaḥ
SA20psk:1275: teṣu ca nikāyasabhāgeṣu gatibhedenakarmabhedena ca bhinneṣu pratyekam ekajānmiko yaḥ skandhasantānaḥsa nikāyasabhāgākhyaḥ
SA20psk:1277: yaḥ sthitikālaniyama iti abhinnanikāyasabhāgasaṅgṛhītānāṃsaṃskārāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ sthitiniyama ucyate
SA20psk:1278: tasyāḥsthiteḥkālaniyama iyantaṃ kālam anenāsmin nikāyasabhāgesthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ vetyayaṃsthitikālaniyamaḥ
SA20psk:1279: evaṃ ca sthitikālaniyamasvabhāvam āyurity uktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1284: teṣām ātmeti bhāvo yatra sa sattvānāmātmabhāvaḥ
SA20psk:1287: etad uktaṃbhavati gatisthānātmabhāvādibhedena bhinnānāṃ sattvānāṃgatisthānātmabhāvabhedanibandhanaṃ sattvānāṃ yaparaspareṇātmabhāvasādṛśyam tatra nikāyasabhāga itiprajñaptiḥ
SA20psk:1291: saṃskāramātrasyotpādo jātiḥ kiṃ tarhi nikāyasabhāgavartino ye saṃskārāḥ
SA20psk:1292: teṣām evābhūtvā bhāvo jātiḥ na sarveṣām itijñāpanārtham
SA20psk:1293: ye bhāvānām anutpannāvinaṣṭānāmarthāntarabhūtāṃ jātiṃ kāritrataś cādhvavyavasthāṃpratipannāḥ tanmatanirāsārtham āha abhūtvā bhāva iti
SA20psk:1294: svarūpasyaiva hi saṃskārāṇām abhūtvā bhāvo jātiḥ nārthāntarabhūtā na ca kāritrato 'dhvavyavastheti
SA20psk:1298: tatrāntare hetuphalabhāvenāvasthitānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairantaryeṇotpādaḥ prabandha ucyate
SA20psk:1301: kalalādyavasthāsv api pūrvasmād uttarasya pratikṣaṇamnyathābhāvo vācyaḥ
SA20psk:1302: evaṃ ca prabandhānyathātvejarāprajñaptiḥ naikasya kṣaṇasya nāpy arthāntarabhūteti
SA20psk:1305: ā maraṇāt saṃskārāṇāṃprabandhavṛttau sthitir iti prajñaptiḥ naikasya kṣaṇasya nāpyarthāntarabhūteti jñāpitaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1307: tathaiva teṣām ity ekasmin nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāṃprabandhoparame 'nityatā prajñapyate
SA20psk:1311: tat kimarthaṃ nikāyasabhāga evasaṃskārasantānasya jātyādaya uktāḥ na bāhyasya rūpasyeti
SA20psk:1312: yānīmāni bhagavatā saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīty uktāni jātir jarāsthitir anityatā ca tāni sattvākhyān eva saṃskārān ādhikṛtya nabāhyān iti jñāpanārtham
SA20psk:1313: kasmāt punar bhagavatā ubhayeṣāmapi tulye jātisattveupāttān eva saṃskārān adhikṛtyasaṃskṛtalakṣaṇāny uktāni
SA20psk:1314: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvartavivartaprabhāvitam ādhyātmikās tu saṃskārājātijarādiprabhāvitāḥ
SA20psk:1315: etad uktaṃ bhavati vināśotpādaubāhyasya rūpasya saṃvartavivartaśabdena loke prasiddhāv itibhagavatāpi lokam anuvartamānena tathaivoktau na jātyādiśabdena
SA20psk:1316: ādhyātmikās tu saṃskārā jātijarādiprabhāvitāḥ jātā jīrṇāḥ sthitā vinaṣṭā iti teṣāṃ bhagavatāpilokānuvṛttyotpādādayo jātyādiśabdena nirdiṣṭā
SA20psk:1324: yenānabhilapyasvarūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ dyotyatetad abhidhānaṃ nāmety ucyate tadyathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃrūpaṃ śabda iti
SA20psk:1327: evaṃ nāmno laukikācca padāt padaṃ viśeṣitaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1332: anyatrāvartamānaṃ svabhāvaṃviśinaṣṭīti viśeṣaḥ tadyathā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥsarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇam
SA20psk:1333: etad uktaṃ bhavati vastusvabhāvābhidhānamātraṃ nāmaviśiṣṭavastusvabhāvābhidhānaṃ padam iti
SA20psk:1340: ubhayaśabdād api kevalāt katamasyobhayasyeti na vijñāyate
SA20psk:1342: evam anantarasyaivanāmnaḥ padasya cābhivyañjakatvād vyañjanam ity uktaṃbhavati
SA20psk:1349: yadavastheṣv artheṣu vyutpādyante tadavastheṣv eva nāmapadayoḥ prajñaptir iti te tadāśrayatvenocyante
SA20psk:1354: na punarevam akārasya paryāyāntaram asti yenākārābhidhānaṃmuktvākāro gamyeta
SA20psk:1355: etāvac ca sarvaṃ yad uta svabhāvoviśeṣas tadubhayavyavahāraś ca
SA20psk:1356: tat sarvam ebhiranuvyavahriyata ity ata ete nāmapadavyañjanakāyāvyavasthāpitā iti
SA20psk:1357: evam anyeṣām api viprayuktānāṃnāmapadavyañjanakāyavat prayojanāpekṣayā vyavasthānaṃveditavyam
SA20psk:1359: yasya dharmasya yogāt pṛthagjana ity ākhyāyate tatpṛthagjanatvam
SA20psk:1365: tathā hyanutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate
SA20psk:1372: hetuphalanānātvaṃ punar iṣṭasya viṣayasya sucaritam aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃpṛthag anyonyahetutā
SA20psk:1375: tadyathādānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalaṃ
SA20psk:1382: hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham so 'tītaḥ kāla itiprajñapyate
SA20psk:1386: pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsusarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ
SA20psk:1394: evam ete cittaviprayuktāḥsaṃskārā dharmāṇāmavasthāviśeṣeṣu prajñapyanta iti prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ
SA20psk:1396: saṃskāraskandhānantaraṃvijñānaskandho veditavya ity ata āha vijñānaskandhaḥ
SA20psk:1404: vijñānasvarūpam uktvā tatparyāyapradarśanārtham āha cittaṃ mano 'pitad iti
SA20psk:1411: ata eva tadindriyāśrayeṇāpy utpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyatenendriyam
SA20psk:1412: tathāṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ yad yannirudhyatetat tad anantarasyavijñānasyotpadyamānasyāśrayabhāvena vyavatiṣṭhata ity ataḥsamanantaracittasanniśrayatām upādāya mana ity ucyate
SA20psk:1413: yadetac citratvāc cittam ity uktam taj jātim adhikṛtya nalakṣaṇam
SA20psk:1414: lakṣaṇaṃ tu pratiniyatālambanākāratvān na citramiti na tat prādhānyena cittam
SA20psk:1417: atraiva kāraṇam āha tathāhitac citaṃ sarvasaṃskārabījairiti
SA20psk:1419: lsarvasaṃskārabījaiś citatvāc cittam itiprādhānyena tad evacittam
SA20psk:1424: paunaḥpunyena saṃskārāṇāṃ samudācārād bījapuṣṭir vāsanety ucyate
SA20psk:1428: tathā hi sūtre 'py uktam cakṣuraparibhinnaṃ bhavati rūpāṇy ābhāsagatāni tajjaś camanasikāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati evaṃ tajjasya cakṣurvijñānasya prādurbhāvo bhavatīti
SA20psk:1430: hetupratyayastu sadā sannihitatvād durvijñeyatvāc ca noktaḥ
SA20psk:1431: tadanantaraṃ paryeṣakaṃ manovijñānamparyeṣakād anantaraṃvyavasthāpakam evaṃ vyavasthāpakānantaraṃ vikalpakaṃ manovijñānam utpadyate
SA20psk:1437: tatra ye 'py anye 'kuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāś ca dharmāsteṣām apy ayam eva nayaḥ
SA20psk:1438: avyākṛtās tu niṣyandavāsanām evapuṣṇanti na vipākavāsanām teṣām avipākatvāt
SA20psk:1441: tathā hi sarvasaṃskārāḥ svabījādhānevartamānā ālayavijñānātmātiśayahetubhāvena vyavatiṣṭhantaitisarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ tat kāryam
SA20psk:1442: sarvasaṃskārāś catadbījopādānād ālayavijñānād utpadyanta itisarvasaṃskārāṇām ālayavijñānaṃ kāraṇam
SA20psk:1443: vipākavāsanāṃ tvadhikṛtya kuśalākuśalānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kāryam eva tatnakāraṇam
SA20psk:1444: kāraṇaṃ tu tad vipākavāsanām upādāyanikāyasabhāgāntareṣu vipākavijñānasyaiveti
SA20psk:1452: etaccālambanaṃ sūkṣmatvāllokapaṇḍitair apiduravadhāram ity ato 'paricchinnālambanākāram ity ucyate napunar anālambanam eva
SA20psk:1457: ālayavijñānaṃsasamprayogaṃ pūrvakarmasaṃskārahetukatvād ekāntenavipāka evety avyākṛtajātīyam eva
SA20psk:1459: atra hyālayavijñānaṃnikāyasabhāgāntareṣu pratisandhim upādāya yāvac cyutiṃtāvat kṣaṇaprabandhapravāhena vartate na tv antarāntarāvicchidyate
SA20psk:1462: tathā kuśalānantaram akuśalam utpadyateakuśalānantaraṃ kuśalam tadubhayānantaram avyākṛtamhīnadhātukānantaraṃ madhyadhātukammadhyadhātukānantaraṃ praṇītadhātukampraṇītadhātukānantaram apraṇītadhātukamapraṇītadhātukānantaraṃ madhyadhātukam iti vistareṇavācyam
SA20psk:1463: nāpy ekaṃ dravyam ā maraṇād anuvartata iti
SA20psk:1468: punaś ca sandhinirmocane 'py uktam ādānavijñāna gambhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījaḥ
SA20psk:1469: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśito mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyuḥ
SA20psk:1474: nirodhāsañjñisamāpattisamāpannasyāsañjñike ca prādurbhūteniravaśeṣeṣu pravṛttivijñāneṣu niruddheṣu punarvyutthānakālaālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate
SA20psk:1475: na hisamāpatticittāt tasyotpattir yuktā tasya ciraniruddhatvānniruddhasya cāsattvāt asac ca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃpradhānātmādivat
SA20psk:1478: tathā hy akurvatkāritro 'nāgataḥkurvatkāritro vartamānaḥ uparatakāritro 'tīta ity ucyate
SA20psk:1479: evaṃtarhi kāritraṃ bhāvād anyad ityabhyupagantavyamatītānāgatāvasthayoḥkāritre 'saty api bhāvābhyupagamāt
SA20psk:1480: evaṃ ca kāritrasyaivotpādo vyayaś ca na bhāvānām abhūtvābhāvād bhūtvā cābhāvāt na carūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānānām sarvadāsvarūpādhyāsitatvāt
SA20psk:1481: tataś cotpādavyayābhāvān nirodhavannānityā rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ syuḥ
SA20psk:1482: tataś ca duḥkhā api na syuḥ
SA20psk:1483: uktaṃ hi sūtre yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti
SA20psk:1484: evaṃ caskandhān anityato duḥkhataś ca cintayato viparyāsa evasyāt
SA20psk:1485: na ca viparyāsāt kleśaprahāṇaṃ yuktam anitye duḥkhe canityasukhaviparyāsavat
SA20psk:1486: kāritrasya cotpādavyayasambhavāt saṃskṛtatvam rūpādiṣu ca skandheṣusaṅgrahābhāvāt ṣaṣṭhaḥskandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ
SA20psk:1487: na ca sāsravā dharmāupādānaskandhaiḥ sarve vā saṃskṛtāḥ skandhaiḥ saṅgṛhītā itivaktavyam
SA20psk:1488: anyaḥ punar āha kāritraṃ nāma phalaparigrahaḥ
SA20psk:1489: dharmo hi yasya dharmasya hetubhāvena vyavatiṣṭhatesa dharmas taṃdharmaṃ phalatvena gṛhṇātīty ato hetubhāvavyavasthānaṃbhāvānāṃ phalaparigrahaḥ
SA20psk:1490: hetubhāvena ca sa eva dharmo vyavatiṣṭhata itidharmebhyaḥ kāritram ananyat
SA20psk:1493: etad uktaṃ bhavati nānyat kāritraṃ dharmāt kiṃ tarhi dharma eva kāritram
SA20psk:1498: kāritrasya vā dharmasvarūpavad dharmād ananyatvāttraiyadhvakatvam abhyupagantavyam
SA20psk:1501: anyac cānyena kriyate na svātmanaivatasya kṛtatvāt
SA20psk:1506: tathā hi phalasya kāraṇavat pūrvameva pariniṣpannatvāt phalasya kiṃ kurvat kāraṇaṃ bhavatiakurvad vā kathaṃ kāraṇam
SA20psk:1507: phalam api tenākriyamāṇaṃkathaṃ tasya kāryaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1508: kāritrāṇām eva ca parasparatohetuphalabhāvaḥ na dharmāṇām
SA20psk:1510: na tu dharmasvarūpam nāpidharmasvarūpād dharmasvarūpam sarvadāstitvāt
SA20psk:1511: tathā cayasmin sati yad bhavati asati ca na bhavatitat tasya kāraṇamitarac ca kāryam
SA20psk:1513: evaṃ ca nadharmasvarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ na kāryam iti lokaśāstravirodhaḥ
SA20psk:1519: evaṃ tarhi yan na tatsvabhāvaṃ nānyasvabhāvam tac chaśaviṣāṇavan niḥsvabhāvatvān nāstyeveti
SA20psk:1522: tasmād anutpanno bhāvo 'nāgataḥ niruddho 'tītaḥutpannāniruddho vartamāna ity abhyupeyam
SA20psk:1523: na punar akurvatkāritro 'nāgataḥ kurvatkāritro vartamānaḥuparatakāritro 'tīta iti
SA20psk:1524: anyaḥ punar āha sendriyaṃ rūpaṃ cittaṃ cānyonyabījakamity ato nirodhāsañjñisamāpattibhyām asañjñikāc cavyuttiṣṭhataḥ sendriyād rūpāc cittam
SA20psk:1525: yathārūpyadhātoś cyavamānasya cittād eva ciraniruddham api sendriyaṃ rūpam utpadyata iti
SA20psk:1526: tasmān nātra kiñcid ālayavijñānena prayojanam iti
SA20psk:1527: evaṃ tarhy ekaikasya sattvasyadvau cittasantānau syātām
SA20psk:1530: tataś cāsya parinirvāṇam eva syād ityakalpaneyam
SA20psk:1531: ekaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ svasattādhyāsitaṃ nirīhamanityaṃ śaktaṃ ceṣyate na viparyāsāt
SA20psk:1532: tathā hy uktaṃbhagavatā asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādād idamutpadyate
SA20psk:1534: tasmān na nityohetuḥ nāpy asan na sadvyāpāro nāpy aśaktaiti
SA20psk:1535: ālayavijñānaṃhi sarvasaṃskṛtadharmabījānugatam ā maraṇāt santānavṛtticety ālayavijñānād evācittakāvasthāto vyuttiṣṭhataḥpravṛttivijñānam utpadyata
SA20psk:1536: sūtre ca nirodhasamāpannasyavijñānaṃ kāyād anapakrāntamity uktam
SA20psk:1537: na cālayavijñānādanyasya nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ vijñānasya kāyādanapakramo yujyate
SA20psk:1539: nirodhasamāpannasyālayavijñānād yadyanyavijñānasamudācāra iṣyate tataś catrayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥsparśaḥ sparśasahajā vedanā sañjñā cetaneti sūtre vacanātsañjñāvedanayor api samudācāro 'bhyupagantavyaḥ
SA20psk:1540: tataś cavedanāsañjñāsadbhāvāt sañjñāveditanirodha eva na syāt
SA20psk:1541: yo 'pimanyate sūtrevedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇāuktā na ca sarvā vedanātṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayaḥ
SA20psk:1542: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na sarvaḥsañjñāvedanāpratyaya iti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ
SA20psk:1544: viśeṣitā hivedanā sūtrāntare avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ veditaṃpratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti
SA20psk:1545: na tv evaṃ kvacit sparśo viśeṣita ity asamānam etat
SA20psk:1546: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānād evasarvabījakāt sarvāsv avasthāsu santānena vartamānānnirodhāsañjñisamāpattyāsañjñikebhyo vyutthānacittamutpadyata ity abhyupeyam
SA20psk:1550: ālambanapratyayaḥ pañcānāṃcakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayāḥmanovijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ
SA20psk:1555: prakārāntareṇa vṛttir ātmalābho'syavijñānasyeti tad vijñānaṃ prakārāntaravṛtti
SA20psk:1557: ālambanapratyayāpekṣā kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥprakārāntaravṛttitāyāḥ sālambanapratyayāpekṣā tādṛśīṃprakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya gṛhītvā pravṛttivijñānād anyadālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānabījabhūtam astīti vijñāyate
SA20psk:1558: atrahi vijñānaṃ pratyavabhāsabhedāt parasparato bhidyate nasamanantarādhipatipratyayabhedāt
SA20psk:1559: ata etad evam uktam ālambanapratyayāpekṣāṃ prakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya
SA20psk:1560: sācaprakārāntaravṛttitā yathā nālambananirapekṣā yujyate tathāhetupratyayanirapekṣāpi naiva yujyate
SA20psk:1561: yaś ca yeṣāṃ bījairanugataḥ sa teṣāṃ hetupratyayaḥ
SA20psk:1562: na ca pravṛttivijñānānāṃparasparabījatvaṃ yujyate kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃhīnamadhyapraṇītadhātūnāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃsāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ paryāyeṇa bhāvāt
SA20psk:1563: na hitenaiva tasya vāsanā dṛṣṭā nāpy anyenabhinnakālenāsambaddhena vā kiṃ tarhi sahotpādavināśair evapuṣpādibhis tilādīnāṃ vāsanā dṛṣṭā
SA20psk:1564: ato vipākavāsanāvijñānena samakālaṃ tata evotpadyamānāninirudhyamānāni capravṛttivijñānāni svānurūpakāryotpādanasamarthaṃvipākavijñānaṃ kurvanti
SA20psk:1566: taiś ca prakārāntaravṛttibhiḥ pravṛttivijñānair vāsitādvipākavijñānāt punar apy ālambanāpekṣāṇi kuśalākuśalādiprakārāntaravṛttīni pravṛttivijñānāny utpadyantaity avaśyam abhyupagantavyam
SA20psk:1569: acittakamiddhamūrchādyavasthāsu cchinnepravṛttivijñānasantāne punar acittakamiddhamūrchāpagataālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate
SA20psk:1572: pravṛttivijñānād anyad ālayavijñānam yannimittāsaṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca gamyate
SA20psk:1576: tatr ālay avij ñānā nabh yupa gamesaṃskārapratyayavijñānābhāvāt saṃsārapravṛttir na yujyate
SA20psk:1577: ālayavijñānānabhyupagame hi pratisandhivijñānaṃ vāsaṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥsaṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam
SA20psk:1578: tatra napratisandhivijñānaṃ pūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārapratyayampūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārāṇāṃciraniruddhatvāt niruddhasya cāsattvāt asataś ca pratyayābhāvāt
SA20psk:1579: yadi niruddhasyapratyayatvaṃ neṣyate evaṃ ca saty aphalam eva karma syātna hi vartamānāt karmaṇo vipāko nirvartate
SA20psk:1581: karmāhitāyāś cittasantāne vāsanāyāḥparipākaviśeṣaṃ gatāyā vipāko nirvartate
SA20psk:1582: tasmān na viphalaṃkarma na ca niruddhāt karmaṇo vipāka iti
SA20psk:1583: pratisandhau canāmarūpam eva na kevalaṃ vijñānam
SA20psk:1584: tatra vijñānam evasaṃskārapratyayam na ca nāmarūpam iti kātra yuktiḥ
SA20psk:1585: tasmāt saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vaktayam natu vijñānamiti
SA20psk:1588: tasya prātisandhikānnāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ napūrvam pūrvaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nottaram ity ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu
SA20psk:1593: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau ca nāmarūpamevety eṣaiva nītir niravadyā
SA20psk:1594: ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥsaṃskāraparibhāvitāḥ saṃskārapratyayam vijñānam ity ayamapi pakṣo durghaṭita eva
SA20psk:1596: na hi vijñānaṃvipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vātmany ādhātuṃsamartham ātmani kāritravirodhāt
SA20psk:1599: acittakāsu ca middhādyavasthāsupunaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasambhavādvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt
SA20psk:1607: ata evana dṛṣṭasatyānāṃ karmāṇi punarbhavam ākṣipantidarśanaprahātavyakleśābhāvāt
SA20psk:1609: tathā hitraidhātukavītarāgāṇām ākṣiptapunarbhavam api karmakleśābhāvād bhavībhavituṃ notsahate
SA20psk:1611: evaṃ ca pradhānatvāt kleśā evasaṃsārapravṛtter mūlam
SA20psk:1614: sammukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyeta bījāvastho vā
SA20psk:1615: tatrasammukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam tadātatprahāṇamārgābhāvāt
SA20psk:1616: bījāvastho 'pi naiva prahīyate na hipratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatrakleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃtatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta
SA20psk:1617: atha pratipakṣacittameva kleśabījānuṣaktam iṣyate na hi kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo yujyate
SA20psk:1618: nacāprahīṇakleśabījānāṃ saṃsāravinivṛttiḥsambhavatīti tasmādavaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūtaiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyatesvabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity upeyam
SA20psk:1619: punaś ca tata eva santatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃbhāvanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ pravartante
SA20psk:1621: tasmiṃś cāpanīte punastenāśrayeṇa kleśānām anutpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥprāpyate
SA20psk:1623: na hikarmavidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣusahakārikāraṇābhāvātpunarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃsamartham
SA20psk:1624: ata evālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś canānyathety avaśyam ālayavijñānam abhyupagantavyam
SA20psk:1634: athavālīyanta upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥkāryabhāvena tad vālīyata upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvenasarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ
SA20psk:1642: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ātmamānālayanimittatāṃ copādāyeti
SA20psk:1651: ataḥ kāyapratibaddhavṛttitvāt tatkāye ālīnam iti kāyālīnam
SA20psk:1654: na kevalam ālayavijñānam etad ucyate kiṃ tarhyādānavijñānam apīti
SA20psk:1662: na cakṣurādivijñānānitatpṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ vā manovijñānam teṣāṃ tata ūrdhvaṃvartamānacakṣurādipratyayanimittatvāt
SA20psk:1663: na ca tatrānyanmanovijñānaṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ tasya kuśalākuśalatvāt
SA20psk:1667: api capratiniyatāśrayapravṛttatvāt ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃvicchedapravṛttatvāc ca na sarvasyāśrayasyopādānaṃprasajyate
SA20psk:1668: tathā hiyena yenāśrayeṇa yad vijñānaṃ pravartatesa eva tenopāttaḥ syāt avaśiṣṭasyānupāttatvaṃvijñānavirahitatvāt
SA20psk:1669: tathā cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicchedena punaḥ punaḥ pravartata ititadāśrayasya punaḥ punarupādānadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ
SA20psk:1670: tasmād ālayavijñānam evapratisandhau kāyam upādatte ā maraṇāc ca samastakāyāśrayeṇa pravartata iti tad eva rpratisandhibandhātprabhṛty ā maraṇāt kāyam upādātta ity ādānavijñānam ity ucyate
SA20psk:1673: kliṣṭaṃ hi mana ālayavijñānam ātmatvena nityam ālambateātmālambanair mohadṛṣṭimānasnehaiḥ samprayuktatvāt
SA20psk:1676: yat ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānakāyānāṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ mana ity uktam tat ṣaṣṭhasyamanovijñānasyāśrayaprasiddhyartham na tumanyanākāratvāt
SA20psk:1680: atra tv ātmagrahaṇaṃ na mohamātreṇa samprayujyate kiṃtarhy ātmaniyo mohaḥ
SA20psk:1683: tasyāpratītatvāccaittānām api caittaiḥ samprayogāc catatsvarūpanirdhāraṇārtham āha vijñānam iti
SA20psk:1684: ekajātīyam iti kliṣṭajātīyam na kuśalam avyākṛtaṃ vānityam ātmamohādibhiś caturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ samprayuktatvāt
SA20psk:1685: santānānuvṛtti cety avicchedena vartata ity arthaḥ
SA20psk:1688: nira vaśe ṣatr aidh ātuk akli ṣṭad harm apra hīṇa tvāt
SA20psk:1693: atra ca mano nirvacanataālambanataḥ samprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataś ca nirdiṣṭaṃveditavyam
SA20psk:1700: āṃ rūpādīnāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatāmupādāya rūpādayaḥ skandhā uktāḥ
SA20psk:1701: y zyat kiñcid rūpam aatītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vāaudarikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vāntikesarvam aikadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandhaitisaṅkhyāṃ gacchatītyevaṃ yāvad vijñānam
SA20psk:1703: ādhyātmikā vā bāhyā veti santānabhedena yasmādādhyātmikāḥ svāsāntānikāḥ bāhyās tato 'nye
SA20psk:1708: hīnā vā praṇītā veti gatibhedena bhinnāḥ
SA20psk:1710: yad vādūre yad vāntika iti deśabhedena bhinnāḥ
SA20psk:1713: saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāyetydhva sant ānap rakā raga tide śabh edab hinn ānāṃrūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ pratyekaṃ saṅkṣepeṇasaṅgrahaḥ
SA20psk:1715: tāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāya sūtre rāśyarthaḥskandhārtho vijñāyate
SA20psk:1717: tat sarvam atītādikaṃrūpam ekadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandha itisaṅkhyāṃ gacchatīti
SA20psk:1727: rūpaskandhavibhāge yathā cakṣurādayaḥ svarūpato nirdiṣṭāḥtathehāpi svarūpatonirdeṣṭavyā iti
SA20psk:1728: tatra hy uktaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya varṇaviṣayo rūpaprasādaścakṣurindriyam iti
SA20psk:1732: pūrvaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaś cakṣuṣo viṣayovarṇaḥsaṃsthānaṃ vijñaptiś ca rūpam
SA20psk:1739: vijñānāni vijñānaskandhaḥ ṣaḍ pravṛttivijñānāniālayavijñānaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca manaḥ
SA20psk:1745: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu noktam ity atas tatprabhedabubhutsayā pṛcchati asaṃskṛtaṃ katamad iti
SA20psk:1754: sapratighaṃ rūpaṃ yatra pradeśe napratihanyatesa tasyāvakāśaḥ
SA20psk:1755: ato rūpiṇāṃ bhāvānāmavakāśadānād ākāśam ity ucyate
SA20psk:1756: ākāśānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tann irde ś ānant aram evāpratisaṅkhyānirodhasvarūpāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ katama iti
SA20psk:1760: tad uktaṃ bhavati duḥkhādīnām āryasatyānāṃpratipratisaṅkhyānaṃ pratisaṅkhyā
SA20psk:1765: etad uktaṃ bhavati pratyayavaikalyādanāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ so'pratisaṅkhyānirodhaiti
SA20psk:1768: pratisaṅkhyānirodhasamāpattyupapattyanityatānirodheṣv apivartata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodhavyavacchedārtham āha na cavisaṃyoga iti
SA20psk:1769: saṃyogo hy anāgatair dharmair bīje sati teṣāmutpattidharmatām upādāya vyavasthāpyate
SA20psk:1770: tatpratipakṣeṇasvāśrayāt teṣāṃ bīje 'poddhṛte yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ pratilabdha itiso 'py apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ prāpnotīty ata āha sa punar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇa vinā skandhānām atyantam anutpāda iti
SA20psk:1772: bhavati ayaṃ hi saty apikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaskandhabījasadbhāvena vinā kleśapratipakṣeṇa labhyata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodha evāyamnāpratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ
SA20psk:1773: evaṃ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣaś canirvāṇadhātuḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati
SA20psk:1776: sahy anutpādobhavatina tv atyantam punaś cittacaittotpādasadbhāvāt
SA20psk:1778: anityatānirodho hi vartamānasyana ca vartamānasyānutpādo 'sti kiṃ tarhy anāgatasyaiveti
SA20psk:1779: tadyathaikarūpaprakāravyāsaktacakṣurvijñānasya yāni viṣayāntarāṇy utpattimanti rūpaprakārāntarāṇi catadālambanaiḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyair na śakyam utpattumvartamāneṣu samanantarapratyayābhāvāt atīteṣvālambanapratyayābhāvāt
SA20psk:1784: yo nirodhaiti sarvanirodhaprasaṅga ityāha sa cavisaṃyogaiti
SA20psk:1787: visaṃyogam eva nirūpayati sapunar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇaskandhānāmatyantam anutpāda iti
SA20psk:1790: tatra yasyayasya yo yo mārgakṣaṇaḥ pratipakṣaḥ tasmin mārga utpannesa āśrayakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleśabījānugatamnantarasyāśrayasya kṣaṇāntaram utpādayituṃ na śaknotitadutpattiviruddhapratyayasānnidhyāt
SA20psk:1792: sa eva mārgakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleṣabījānugatasya kṣaṇāntarasyotpattaye viguṇaḥpratyayaḥitarasyānuguṇo veditavyaḥ
SA20psk:1793: evaṃ yāvadbhāvanāheyasyamṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣa utpanne sa āśrayoniravaśeṣatraidhātukadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyakleśabījavyāvṛ ttyātmakasyaiva kṣaṇāntarasya kāraṇībhavati
SA20psk:1794: evaṃ yasyayasya kleśasyāśrayāpravṛttito bījam uddhṛtaṃ bhavati tasyatasya tatsamprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃkleśapratipakṣeṇātyantam anutpādaḥ prāpto
SA20psk:1796: pratisaṅkhyānirodhād anantaraṃ tathatoddiṣṭety atastannirdeśānantaraṃ tathatāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ tathatā
SA20psk:1802: dharmāṇāṃ kāryānityatādayo 'pi dharmatā vidyanta ity ata āha dharmanairātmyam iti
SA20psk:1803: dharmā hi yena rūpeṇajñānābhidhānayor viṣayībhavanti tat teṣām ātmā
SA20psk:1807: atra tu vicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃjāyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena prastutam evārabhyate
SA20psk:1810: parasparavibhinnarūpeṣv aviśeṣeṇa pravartata ity atas teṣu tenasāmānyam artham upādāya pravartitavyam sa ca na vijñāyataiti praśnaḥ kenārthenāyatananīti
SA20psk:1820: evaṃ yāvan mano dharmāś casasamprayogasya manovijñānasyāyadvāram
SA20psk:1821: āyatanānantaraṃ dhātavaḥ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca vaktavyāity ataḥ prabhedadarśanārtham āha aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti
SA20psk:1823: teṣām eva svarūpapradarśanārtham āha cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur evaṃ yāvanmanodhātur dharmadhātur
SA20psk:1825: atra hi rūpaskandhavibhāgeyāni cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanāni pañcendriyāṇy uktāni pañca ca rūpaśabdagandharasasparśāḥteṣāṃviṣayatvena
SA20psk:1826: āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ tāny eva pañcendriyāṇicakṣurādyāyatanatvenoktāni rūpādayaś ca viṣayārūpādyāyatanatvena
SA20psk:1827: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva cakṣurdhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ rūpadhātur yāvat spraṣṭavyadhātur ityuktam ity ata āha tatra cakṣurādidhātavo
SA20psk:1829: dharmadhātus tu yad eva dharmāyatanaṃ vedanādayas trayaḥskandhā avijñaptir asaṃskṛtacatuṣṭayaṃ ca
SA20psk:1831: napunar evaṃdhātuvyavasthāyāṃ manaāyatanam evamanodhātuḥ kiṃ tarhi manaāyatanaṃ dhātuvyavasthāyāṃsapta cittadhātavaḥ
SA20psk:1840: manodhātuḥpunaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānavyatirikto na vidyate kiṃ tarhi ta evaṣaḍvijñānadhātavo 'nantaraniruddhā manodhātur ityucyate
SA20psk:1841: r snanv evaṃ saptadaśa dhātavaḥ prāpnuvanti dvādaśa vāmanodhātoḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ cā vijñānadhātūnām itaretarāntarbhāvāt
SA20psk:1847: tatra pañcendriyāṇi cakṣurādīni pañca viṣayā rūpādayaāyatanavyavasthāyāṃdaśāyatanāni dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ daśa dhātavaḥ
SA20psk:1853: rūpaskandhād vijñānaskandhāc ca trayovedanāsañjñāsaṃskārākhyāḥ skandhārūpaskandhapradeśaś cāvijñaptyākhyaḥ tedharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuś ca
SA20psk:1859: na hikṣaṇikānāṃ vyāpāraḥ sambhavatīti pūrvam evoktam
SA20psk:1860: ya eva dharmāḥ skandhā iti deśitāḥ ta eva punar āyatanatvenadhātutvena cety ataḥ pṛcchati kimarthaṃ
SA20psk:1862: sarvā hi deśanā bhagavatāṃbuddhānāṃ saprayojanā sattvārthapravṛttatvātkleśapratipakṣeṇa ca
SA20psk:1863: na cātra prayojanaṃ vijñāyate punaḥpunas teṣām eva dharmāṇām anyenānyena ca prakāreṇadeśanā iti kimarthaṃ skandhādideśaneti prayojanaṃvaktavyam ity ata āha trividhātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti
SA20psk:1864: tatra navijñāyatekatamas trividha ātmagrāhaḥ katamasya vāpratipakṣeṇa katamā deśanety ata āha yathākramaṃ
SA20psk:1868: sarve hy ātmavādinaevaṃ pratipannāḥ ya eva paśyati sa eva śṛṇoti jighraty āsvādayatispṛśati ceti
SA20psk:1869: tatra ya eva vedayate sa eva cetayate sañjānītevijānātīti
SA20psk:1870: na hi sattvātmabhāva evaṃ skandhavyatirikto 'nyaḥkaścid ekavyavasthitarūpo vidyatetatsvarūpakāryānupalabdheḥ
SA20psk:1872: cakṣur eva hi darśanākhyasya vijñānasyāsādhāraṇaṃkāraṇam āśrayaś cetidraṣṭṛtvenopacaryate
SA20psk:1875: sañjñaiva nimittodgrahaṇātmikatvāt sañjānītenānyaity evaṃ sarvatra vācyam
SA20psk:1878: ekatvagrāhe vyāvartiteskandhadeśanayā yas tatraikatvagrāhapūrvaka ātmagrāhaḥasāv api vyāvartita evety ataekatvagrāhapūrvātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa
SA20psk:1879: ekatvagrāhas tu kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvātmagrāha ity uktaḥ
SA20psk:1880: bhoktṛgrāhaḥ punaḥ sarvavādināṃ yaḥ śubhāśubhasyakarmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanāprabhāvitaṃ phalamupabhuṅkte rūpaśabdādīṃś ca viṣayān sa
SA20psk:1884: tāṃ ṣaṭprakārām upalabdhimāyatanāny eva kurvanti nānyaḥ
SA20psk:1885: ata eva cakṣurādayorūpādayaś ca vijñānāyadvārārthenāyatanānīty ucyante
SA20psk:1886: tasmānnāsti kaścid anyaścakṣurādivyatirekeṇa karmaphalasyaviṣayāṇāṃ copabhoktety evam āyatanadeśanābhoktṛtvagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti
SA20psk:1887: kartṛtvagrāhaḥ punar yaḥśubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā valganāsphoṭanādīnāṃ casaātmā
SA20psk:1890: evaṃkāraṇaṃ sattāmātreṇa kāryotpattiṃ prati vyāpriyate kāryaṃca sattāmātreṇaiva kāraṇam apekṣate
SA20psk:1891: na cakāryakāraṇasvarūpavyatirekeṇānyā kriyāsti tat pūrvam evapratipāditam
SA20psk:1894: idānīṃ dharmapravicayānugrahārthaṃ ya evaskandhāyatanadhātutvena dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām evaprakārāś cintyante
SA20psk:1895: tatra dhātuṣu rūpacittayor vibhaktatvenavistarāpadeśāt sāsravaprakārādīnāṃ sukhagamyo nirdeśa iti dhātūn evārabhya cintyate na skandhāyatanānity ata evāha aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati rūpiṇa ityādi
SA20psk:1896: rūpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ tad eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ
SA20psk:1897: āśrayāśritaṃ rūpaṃ vā yathāsambhavam eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ
SA20psk:1898: na ca cakṣurādivijñāneṣuprasaṅgaḥ cakṣurādīnām ādhāratvena teṣām anāśrayatvāt
SA20psk:1902: avijñaptirūpe saty api na dharmadhātorūpitvaprasaṅgas tasyāśrayāśritarūpābhāvād rūpaṇābhāvādrūpaskandhāsaṅgrahāc ca
SA20psk:1916: ekasyaiva rūpadhātoḥ sanidarśanatvena parigrahātśeṣāḥsaptadaśa cakṣurādidhātavaḥ pañca śabdādidhātavaś catvārodharmadhātur ekaḥ sapta cittadhātavaḥ anidarśanā itisiddham
SA20psk:1920: dharmadhātāv apyavijñaptirūpasadbhāvād asti rūpivyapadeśa itidaśety āha
SA20psk:1926: iha tv āvaraṇapratighātenaiva sapratighatvam iṣṭam itipratipādayann āha yatra yaś ca pratihanyata iti
SA20psk:1928: evaṃca yenānyasya svadeśa utpattiḥ pratibadhyate yasya ca pratibadhyate tadubhayam api sapratigham iti jñāpitaṃbhavati
SA20psk:1929: etena ca daśa rūpiṇo dhātavaḥparasparasya svadeśautpattiṃ pratibadhnantīty āvaraṇapratighātena sapratighāḥśeṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś cāpratighāiti
SA20psk:1936: pañcendriyadhātavo rūpādayaḥpañca viṣayadhātavaḥ pañcacakṣurādivijñānadhātavaś ca ete pañcadaśaekāntena sāsravāeva
SA20psk:1937: ādyāapi trayo vidyante cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātavaity ata āha paścimānām iti
SA20psk:1939: teṣām api bhāgo 'ṃśaḥsāsravaḥ na tu cakṣurādivat sarva eva sāsravāḥ
SA20psk:1940: teṣāṃ punaryo namārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasvabhāvo bhāgaḥsa eva sāsravaḥ
SA20psk:1945: nocyate cakṣurādivijñānair eva saha rūpādiṣukleśā utpadyanta itikiṃ tarhi pratyakṣagocaratāmupādāya rūpādiṣu kleśotpattir ucyate
SA20psk:1946: tathā hi cakṣuś capratītya rūpāṇi ca pratītya cakṣurvijñānam utpadyatecakṣurvijñānānubhūtāni rūpāṇi manovijñānena vikalpyantevikalpāc ca kleśā utpadyante iti
SA20psk:1955: pañca rūpādayo viṣayāḥ kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ
SA20psk:1958: athavākāmadhātupratisaṃyuktā iti vaktavye dhātuśabdalopātkāmapratisaṃyuktā ity uktāḥ
SA20psk:1961: te punaḥsarve ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥṣaḍ viṣayadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavaś ca
SA20psk:1965: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaindriyadhātavaḥ catvāroviṣayadhātavaḥ tadviṣayavijñānadhātavaś catvāraḥ ete caturdaśa rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktāḥ
SA20psk:1966: kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃgandharasayo rūpadhātau na bhāvas tadvijñānayoś ca
SA20psk:1967: gandharasau hy ekāntenakavaḍīkārāhārasvabhāvāv evana tu sparśavedanāhārasvabhāvau
SA20psk:1968: api cakavaḍīkārāhāravītarāgāś ca rūpadhātāv upapadyanteyadvītarāgāś ca yatropapadyante tatra tasyābhāvaḥ tadyathārūpavītarāgāṇām ārūpyāpattau
SA20psk:1975: atas tatra daśarūpasvabhāvā dhātavas tadāśrayālambanāś ca pañcavijñānadhātavo na santi
SA20psk:1987: tatra kutsitāc chalitam iti kuśalam gatam ityarthaḥ
SA20psk:1991: kutsitena vākāreṇa śerata itikuśāḥ chedakā vedhakāś ceti
SA20psk:1993: yaśchedanavedhanaparihāreṇa kuśān ādatte sa kuśala ity ucyate
SA20psk:1994: evam anyo 'pi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ praśaṃsām arhati sa kuśalastatrocyate
SA20psk:1998: iti kuśalā apy akuśalā apy avyākṛtā api
SA20psk:1999: te tu na vijñāyantaaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katame daśety āha saptacittadhātavor srūpaśabdadharmadhātavaśceti
SA20psk:2000: atra cittadhātūnāṃ samprayogataḥ kuśalākuśalatvam na svataḥ kuśalākuśalamūlānāṃ ceti
SA20psk:2011: ete hyavyākṛtāevapara mārt hasv abhā vasa mpra yo gasamutth ānat a ḥkuśalākuśalatvābhāvāt
SA20psk:2016: te tu na prajñāyante katamedvādaśety āha rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhāt
SA20psk:2018: śeṣāḥṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍvijñānadhātava ity ete dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ
SA20psk:2021: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ata āha
SA20psk:2035: cittam eva caittānām āśraya iti cittam evātmatvenopacaryate
SA20psk:2036: kathaṃ punar etad gamyate 'trātmatvena cittam abhipretam iti
SA20psk:2037: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnotipaṇḍitaiti
SA20psk:2038: cittasya cānyatra damanam uktam cittasyadamanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvahamiti
SA20psk:2039: atra hi cittasyadamanaṃ cittam eva dāntaṃ sukhāvaham ity uktam
SA20psk:2040: ato 'trāpy ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti cittamevābhipretam iti vijñāyate
SA20psk:2043: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti nahy ete manodhātutvam aprāptāś cittasyāśrayībhavantīti
SA20psk:2044: yadātadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartantaiti
SA20psk:2047: te 'pi na jñāyante katamesaptety ata āha cittadhātavaiti
SA20psk:2050: caśabdaḥ samuccaye sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś ca sālambana iti
SA20psk:2057: pañcendriyadhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ pañca viṣayadhātavorūpādayo dharmadhātupradeśaś cayo nacaitasikasvabhāvaḥ
SA20psk:2063: hy abhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpābhyāṃ samprayuktau tāveva vikalpakau netarau tābhyām asamprayogāt
SA20psk:2065: tatrānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ smṛtir eva mānasy anub hūtā lamb anās ampr amoṣ ākār ā
SA20psk:2066: traiyadhvikaparokṣārthābhyūhanākāra idam evaṃ naivam itiprajñāviśeṣaś cetanā vā 'bhirūpaṇāvikalpaḥ
SA20psk:2080: satyaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ tatra hyatītānāgatā anupāttāuktāḥ te ca na santy eva
SA20psk:2082: vartamānās tusvasattādhyāsitatvāt cittacaittaiś copāttatvād upāttā evacakṣurādayaḥ nānupāttāḥ
SA20psk:2084: na kiṃ tarhi caturṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ
SA20psk:2085: katameṣāṃcaturṇām ity atra āha rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyānām iti
SA20psk:2098: sa punar yaindriyāvinirbhāgavartinaṃ bhāgaṃ sthāpayitvā mūlavarjyeṣu keśaromādiṣu vartate
SA20psk:2104: teṣāṃ na vijñāyate katamepañcetyata āha rūpiṇaiti te punaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanadhātavaḥ
SA20psk:2105: kasya sabhāgāḥ kena prakāreṇa sabhāgā iti na vijñāyate ata āha svavijñānair viṣayasāmānyatām upādāyeti
SA20psk:2107: tena svavijñānena cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa samānam
SA20psk:2109: sāmānyatāmupādāyeti gṛhītvā cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa sabhāgam ucyate
SA20psk:2110: evaṃ śrotrādīnām api svaviṣayaiḥ sabhāgatā vaktavyā
SA20psk:2111: etaduktaṃ bhavati ye cakṣurādayaḥ svavijñānair adhyāsitāḥ tesabhāgāḥ
SA20psk:2114: kimarthaṃ punas te tatsabhāgā ity ucyante
SA20psk:2117: cakṣurādayas te sabhāgānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurādijātyāsamānā iti taiḥ sadṛśatvāt tatsabhāgā ity ucyante
SA20psk:2118: ete hyasādhāraṇatvād ya ekasya sabhāgās tatsabhāgā vā tesarvasattvānām apīti niyatam eṣāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvam
SA20psk:2120: na ca vijñānād anyat kāritram astīti nānyeṣāṃsabhāgatatsabhāgatvam uktam
SA20psk:2123: ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat teṣāñ ca yonirodha evaṃ dī maśramaṇaḥya dharmmo yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinaḥśākyabhikṣuvibhūtiśrimitrasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatvācāryopādhyāyamātā
